\tthe\tpast\tfew\tyears\tand\tmy\tstudents\tlove\tthem\tbecause\tthey\tget\tto\tinteract\twith\tand\task\tme\nquestions\tin\treal\ttime.\tIf\tyou\twant\tto\tfurther\tyour\tpoker\tknowledge\tby\tbeing\tpart\tof\tthese\texclusive\nwebinars,\tplease\tvisit\t\nHoldemBook.com\n.',  Document(page_content='EXAMINING\tTHE\tPOST-BOOM\tEVOLUTION\tIN\tPOKER\nIntroduction\nIt’s\tamazing\thow\tmuch\tpoker\thas\tchanged\tin\tthe\tlast\tdecade.\tWhen\tChris\tMoneymaker\tchanged\tthe\tcourse\nof\tpoker\thistory\tback\tin\t2003,\tthe\tgame\twas\tas\tsimple\tas\tbets\tand\traises,\twith\tBig\tSlick\treigning\nsupreme.\tNowadays\tthe\tgame\tis\tpermeated\twith\tterms\tand\tconcepts\tthat\tcan\tmake\tyour\thead\tspin.\nIf\tyou’re\ta\trecreational\tplayer,\tconcepts\tsuch\tas\tsmall\tball,\trange,\tand\texploitative\tversus\tgame\ttheory\noptimal\tstrategies\tcan\tbe\tintimidating.\tTruth\tis\tyou\tcan\tstill\tplay\tthe\tgame\tand\thave\tfun\twithout\tdelving\tso\ndeep\tinto\tthe\tgame;\tin\tfact,\tI’d\twager\tthe\tmajority\tof\tplayers\tare\tamateurs\twith\tan\telementary\tunderstating\nof\tthe\tgame\twho\tare\tplaying\tto\thave\tfun\tand\tmaybe\twin\ta\tlittle\tcash.\tThere’s\tnothing\twrong\twith\tthat,\tbut\nif\tyou\thope\tto\tcompete\tagainst\tthe\tbest\tand\tone\tday\twin\ta\tbig\tpoker\ttournament,\tyou\tneed\tto\tknow\tyour\nstuff.\nAs\ta\tSenior\tNews\tEditor\tfor\t\nPokerNews.com\n,\tI\tquite\tliterally\tget\tpaid\tto\twatch\tpoker.\tI\ttravel\tto\tthe\nbiggest\ttournaments\ton\tthe\tcircuit\tto\treport\tthe\taction\tfrom\tthe\tfloor,\tand\tsince\t2010,\tI’ve\twitnessed\tsome\nof\tpoker’s\tgreatest\tmoments.\tI\twas\tthere\twhen\tPhil\tHellmuth\twon\tboth\this\trecord\t12th\tand\t13th\tWorld\nSeries\tof\tPoker\tbracelets;\tI\tsat\ttableside\twhen\tthe\tgreat\tPhil\tIvey\twon\tthe\tAussie\tMillions\tAU$250,000\nChallenge\tin\ttwo\tout\tof\tthree\tyears;\tand\tI\twatched\tMark\tNewhouse\tconquer\tinconceivable\todds\tto\tmake\nback-to-back\tNovember\tNines\tin\t2013\tand\t2014,\tultimately\tfinishing\tin\tninth\tplace\tboth\tyears.\nIn\t2013,\tI\teven\tgot\tthe\tchance\tto\tbecome\tpart\tof\tpoker\thistory\twhen\tI\twon\ta\tWSOP\tgold\tbracelet\tand\n$84,915\tin\tEvent\t#1\t($500\tCasino\tEmployees).\tI’ve\ttasted\tglory,\twatched\triver\tcards\tdecimate\tdreams,\nand\tthere\tisn’t\ta\tbad\tbeat\tyou\tcould\ttell\tme\tthat\tI\thaven’t\tseen\tfirst\thand.\tThrough\tit\tall\tI’ve\tlearned\tthe\ngame\tis\tcontinually\tevolving,\tand\tthose\twho\tthrive\tare\tthose\twho\tadapt.\nIn\tthis\tchapter,\tI\twill\ttake\ta\tlook\tback\tat\tthe\tevolution\tof\tpoker\tsince\tthe\tpoker\tboom.\tTo\tdo\tthis,\tI\thave\nselected\tseveral\ttransformations\tthat\thave\toccurred\tover\tthe\tyears,\tand\tdescribe\thands\tI\tfeel\tare\ndemonstrative\tof\tthose\tconcepts.\tSome\tof\tthese\thands\tI’ve\twatched\tplay\tout\tlive\tand\ton\tTV,\twhile\tothers\nI\tpersonally\texperienced\tduring\tmy\tbracelet\trun.\nIdeally\tyou’ll\tuse\tthis\tchapter\tas\ta\tsounding\tboard.\tSee\thow\tpoker\thas\tevolved\tover\tthe\tyears\tand\ncritique\tyour\tgame\tagainst\tit.\tAre\tyou\taware\tof\tthe\tchanges\tdescribed\tthroughout?\tIf\tnot,\tthen\tyou’ve\npinpointed\tan\tarea\tthat\tneeds\timprovement.\nKeep\tin\tmind\tthat\tmany\tof\tthe\tconcepts\tI\tdiscuss\tare\tmere\tintroductions\tdesigned\tto\tshow\tyou\tthe\tpath\nto\tbecoming\ta\tbetter\tpoker\tplayer.\tMany\tof\tthese\tconcepts\tare\tdiscussed\tmore\tthoroughly\telsewhere\tin\nthis\tbook,\tand\tfor\tthose\tthat\taren’t,\tI\tencourage\tyou\tdo\tsome\toutside\tresearch\tto\tacquaint\tyourself.\nOutdated\tpoker\tadages\nThe\tpoker\tboom\tsparked\ta\tpoker\trenaissance.\tTens\tof\tthousands\tof\tplayers\twere\tintroduced\tto\tthe\tgame',  Document(page_content='and\tall\twere\teager\tto\tlearn\tits\tintricacies.\tBooks\tand\tarticles\tof\tthe\tday\tadvocated\ta\tcertain\tplaying\tstyle\nthat\tincluded\t“tight\tis\tright”\tand\t“if\tyou\tcan’t\traise,\tdon’t\tplay.”\tSuch\twords\tof\twisdom\tserved\tplayers\nwell\tfor\tmany\tyears,\tbut\tas\tthe\tgame\tevolved,\tmany\tof\tthese\tadages\thave\tfallen\tby\tthe\twayside.\nUnfortunately\t(or\tfortunately,\tdepending\ton\thow\tyou\tlook\tat\tit),\tmany\tof\tthese\tmaxims\tare\tstill\tthe\nfoundation\tof\tmany\tplayers’\tgames.\tIf\tthat’s\tyou,\tdon’t\tfeel\tguilty.\tFrom\t2005\tto\t2010,\tmy\tpoker\tgame\nremained\tlargely\tunchanged\tand\twas\tunderpinned\tby\tprinciples\tI’d\tlearned\tyears\tbefore.\tI\twas\twinning\tat\nthat\ttime,\tso\tthere\twas\tno\tneed\tto\tchange.\nUnfortunately\tplayers\tgot\tbetter\tand\tthe\tgame\tbegan\tto\ttransform.\tSimply\tput,\tplayers\twere\tevolving\nand\tI\twasn’t\tadapting.\tI\ttried\tthe\tsame\told\ttricks,\twhich\twere\tno\tlonger\tworking,\tso\tof\tcourse,\tI\tbegan\tto\nlose.\tAn\textended\tdownswing\twill\tmake\tanyone\treexamine\ttheir\tgame,\tand\tI\twas\tno\texception.\tBelieve\nme,\tit\twasn’t\teasy\tto\tadmit\tthat\tI\twas\tno\tlonger\tgood\tat\ta\tgame\tI\tloved,\tbut\tonce\tI\tdid,\tI\tresolved\tto\noverhaul\tmy\tstrategy\tso\tthat\tI\tcould\tcompete\tand\twin.\nBelow\tare\tnine\tstrategies\tthat\twere\tonce\tthe\tnorm\tin\tpoker.\tSome\tstill\thave\ta\tplace\tin\tthe\tgame,\tbut\nothers\tare\thopelessly\toutdated.\tSo,\tif\tyou’re\tplaying\twith\tthese\tthings\tin\tmind,\tit’s\tprobably\ttime\tto\nchange\tyour\tgame.\nTight\tis\tright\nIt\twasn’t\tlong\tago\twhen\tplaying\ttight\tin\ttournaments\twas\tthe\tthing\tto\tdo.\tEveryone\twould\twait\tpatiently\nfor\ta\tbig\thand,\tbut\tthen\tsomeone\tcame\talong\tand\trealized\tthey\tcould\tamass\ttons\tof\tchips\tby\tstealing\tthe\nblinds\tand\tantes.\tBefore\tlong,\tothers\tpicked\tup\ton\tit,\tand\tan\t“aggression\trace”\twas\ton.\nI’ll\ttalk\tmore\tabout\tpreflop\taggression\tlater\tin\tthis\tchapter,\tbut\tfor\tnow,\tknow\tthat\tplaying\ttoo\ttight\twill\nopen\tthe\tdoor\tfor\tplayers\tto\ttake\tadvantage\tof\tyou.\tDon’t\tget\tme\twrong,\tthere\tis\ta\ttime\tand\tplace\tfor\n“tight\tis\tright.”\tIt\tshould\tbe\ta\tgear\tyou\tuse\ton\toccasion,\tnot\ta\tplaying\tstyle\tin\titself.\nOpen-raise\tfor\t3BB-4BB\nIf\tyou\tlearned\tto\tplay\tpoker\tin\tthe\tmid-2000s,\tyou\twere\tlikely\ttold\tto\traise\t3BB-4BB\twhen\traising.\tFor\nexample,\tif\tthe\tblinds\twere\t200/400,\tthen\tthe\twisdom\tof\tthe\tday\trecommended\ta\traise\tto\teither\t1,200\tor\n1,600.\tThat\twas\ta\tstandard\tplay\tin\tthe\tpast,\tbut\tover\tthe\tyears,\topen-raise\tamount\thas\tsteadily\tdeclined.\nIn\ttoday’s\tgame\tmany\tplayers\tare\topening\tfor\tthe\tabsolute\tminimum,\tso\tinstead\tof\tmaking\tit\t1,200-\n1,600\tin\tthe\tabove\texample,\tthey’ll\tmake\tit\t800\tto\tgo.\tThis\twas\tsurprisingly\teffective\tas\tmany\tplayers\nwere\thesitant\tto\tprotect\ttheir\tblinds,\twhich\tallowed\tthe\traiser\tto\ttake\tdown\tthe\tblinds\tand\tantes\twith\nminimal\tpressure,\tinvestment\tand\trisk.\nSince\tplayers\tare\tnow\tstarting\tto\tdefend\ttheir\tblinds\twith\ta\twider\trange\tof\thands,\tthe\tgame\tis\tslowly\nmoving\taway\tfrom\tthe\tmin-raise,\tthough\tit’s\tstill\tnowhere\tnear\t3BB-4BB.\tSticking\twith\tthe\t200/400\nexample,\tinstead\tof\topening\tfor\t800,\tplayers\twill\tnow\tup\tit\ta\tbit\tand\traise\tto\tsomething\tlike\t850-1,050.\nOf\tcourse\tyou’re\tfree\tto\traise\twhatever\tamount\tyou’d\tlike,\tbut\tyou\tshould\tbe\taware\twhat\tothers\tare\ndoing\tand\twhy.\tFind\tout\twhat\tworks\tbest\tat\tyour\ttables\tand\tproceed\taccordingly.\nNever\tmin-raise/respect\tthe\traiser\nMin-raising\tused\tto\tbe\ta\trare\tthing\tin\tno-limit\thold’em\tmainly\tbecause\tit\twas\tperceived\tas\ta\tweak\tmove.\nHowever,\twhen\tplayers\trealized\tthat\toftentimes\tthey\tcould\twin\ta\tpot\twith\tminimal\tinvestment,\tthe\tmin-\nraise\tcame\tinto\tfashion.\tAs\ta\tresult,\tthe\tpower\tof\tthe\traise\twas\tdiluted.\tPlayers\tonly\tused\tto\traise\twith\npremium\tcards,\tbut\tnow\tit\tseems\tany\ttwo\tcards\twill\tdo.',  Document(page_content='A\tre-raise\tmeans\teither\taces\tor\tkings\nThere\twas\ta\ttime\tthat\ta\t3-bet\tor\t4-bet\talways\tmeant\tpocket\tkings\tor\taces.\t5-,\t6-\tand\t7-bets\twere\tas\trare\nas\ta\troyal\tflush.\tThat’s\tno\tlonger\tthe\tcase,\tand\ta\thand\tfrom\tthe\tUKIPT\tSeason\t2\tFinale\tin\tLondon\tis\ta\nprime\texample\tof\tthe\tshenanigans\ttaking\tplace\tin\tthe\tgame\ttoday.\nIn\tone\tof\tthe\tmore\tinteresting\thands\tI’ve\tever\tseen,\tMattias\tBergstrom\traised\tto\t7,000\tfrom\tearly\nposition\tholding\t4\n-4\n\tand\tEuropean\tPoker\tTour\tchamp\tBenny\tSpindler\tre-raised\tto\t20,000\twith\tK\n-J\n.\tPaul\tFoltyn\tthen\t4-bet\tto\t50,000\tfrom\tthe\tcutoff\tholding\tA\n-6\n,\tBergstrom\tfolded\tafter\tthe\tbutton\tand\nblinds\thad\tgotten\tout\tof\tthe\tway,\tand\tSpindler\tthought\tfor\ta\tbit\tbefore\t5-betting\tto\t90,000.\nHad\tthe\thole\tcards\tnot\tbeen\tshown,\tthe\taudience\twould\tno\tdoubt\thave\tput\tboth\tplayers\ton\tbig\tpocket\npairs,\tbut\twhat\twas\treally\thappening\twas\ta\tleveling\twar.\tThat\twas\tevidenced\tby\tFoltyn’s\t6-bet\tto\n140,000,\tand\tespecially\tso\twhen\tSpindler\t7-bet\tall-in\tfor\t498,000.\tThat\tdid\tthe\ttrick\tas\tFoltyn\treleased\nhis\thand.\nThat\thand\tis\tan\textreme\texample\tof\tre-raising,\tbut\tit\tgoes\tto\tshow\tyou\tthat\taces\tand\tkings\tare\tno\tlonger\nneeded\tto\tplay\ta\tbig\tpot.\nNo\tmore\tmiddle\tposition\nPoker\tis\ta\tlot\tmore\tdescriptive\tthan\tit\twas\ta\tdecade\tago.\tIt\tused\tto\tbe\tthat\tplayers\twere\teither\tin\tearly,\nmiddle,\tor\tlate\tposition,\tbut\tnow\tthere\tare\tterms\tfor\teach\tspot.\tFirst\tto\tact\tis\t“under\tthe\tgun”\t(UTG);\tright\nof\tthe\tbutton\tis\tthe\t“cutoff,”\tand\tone\tmore\tto\tthe\tright\tis\tthe\t“hijack”.\tGo\tright\tone\tmore\ttime\tand\tyou’ll\nfind\tthe\t“lojack”\tposition.\tThere’s\talso\tUTG+1,\tUTG+2,\tetc.\nIt\tmay\tseem\tlike\ta\tlittle\tmuch\tto\tthe\tamateur\tplayer,\tbut\tby\tidentifying\tthese\tthings,\tplayers\twere\table\tto\n  Document(page_content='creative.\tOn\toccasion,\ttrap\tyour\topponents,\ttake\ta\tfree\tcard,\tand\tdo\twhatever\tyou\tcan\tto\tkeep\tthem\nguessing.\nHit\tor\tfold\nSome\tplayers\tused\tto\tplay\ttheir\thands\tas\tstraightforwardly\tas\tpossible.\tIf\tthey\thit\tthe\tflop,\tthey’d\tplay\tit\nstrong.\tIf\tthey\tdidn’t,\tthey’d\tjust\tgive\tup\ton\tthe\thand.\tIt\tshould\tnever\tbe\tso\tsimple.\tAs\tAllen\tKessler\ttold\nme,\t“It’s\tnow\tthe\topposite.\tInstead\tof\thit\tor\tfold\tit’s\tmiss\tthe\tflop\tthen\tfloat.”\tI\tdelve\tinto\tfloating\tlater\tin\nthis\tchapter,\tbut\tthe\tpoint\tis\tplayers\tno\tlonger\tgive\tup\ton\thands\tso\teasily.\nThis\tis\tjust\ta\tsmall\tsample\tof\tarchaic\tpoker\tstrategies,\tbut\tif\tany\tare\ta\tpart\tof\tyour\tgame,\tyou\tmay\twant\nto\tmake\tsome\tchanges.\tIt\twas\tCharles\tDarwin\twho\tintroduced\tus\tto\t“survival\tof\tthe\tfittest”,\tand\tthat\nconcept\tcertainly\tapplies\tto\tpoker.\tThe\tbest\tplayers\tin\tthe\tworld\tare\tconstantly\tstudying,\tresearching\tand\nfine-tuning\ttheir\tgame\tin\tan\tarduous\tand\tnever-ending\tprocess.\tIt’s\tdaunting,\tbut\tthose\twho\tput\tin\tthe\twork\nreap\tthe\trewards.\nAsk\tyourself\twhat\tyou\tcan\tdo\tto\timprove\tyour\tgame.\tThe\tbest\tplace\tto\tstart\tis\tto\tlearn\twhat\tothers\tare\ndoing.\tBelow\tare\ta\tseries\tof\tgame-changing\tobservations\tI’ve\tmade\tover\tthe\tyears,\tand\tI\tcan\tconfidently\nsay\tyou\tneed\tto\tbe\taware\tof\tthese\tadvancements\tif\tyou\thope\tto\tcompete\tin\tthis\tday\tand\tage.\nThe\tgame\thas\tchanged\nBigger\tbuy-ins\tand\tdeeper\tstacks\nTournament\tstructures,\twhich\tare\tlargely\taffected\tby\tstarting\tstacks,\tare\tamong\tthe\tbiggest\tchanges\tin\tthe\ndecade\tfollowing\tthe\tpoker\tboom.\tFrom\tthe\tWSOP’s\tinception\tin\t1970\tup\tthrough\t2006,\tplayers\treceived\na\tstarting\tstack\tequivalent\tto\tthe\tamount\tof\teach\tevent’s\tbuy-in.\tFor\texample,\tin\tthe\tMain\tEvent,\tplayers\nreceived\t10,000\tin\ttournament\tchips\tfor\tth \tin\t2009\tat\tthe\tbehest\tof',  Document(page_content='The\trise\tof\tsmall\tball\nIn\tthe\tfirst\thand\tof\tthe\t2005\tWSOP,\tthe\tson\tof\tactress\tGoldie\tHawn,\ta\tfellow\tnamed\tOliver\tHudson,\nsquared\toff\tagainst\t2003\tWSOP\trunner-up\tSammy\tFarha.\tIt\tbegan\twhen\tFarha\traised\tto\t200\twith\tA\n-10\nonly\tto\thave\tHudson\t3-bet\tto\t450\tholding\tthe\t10\n-10\n.\tAction\tfolded\tback\tto\tFarha,\twho\tcalled\tto\tsee\ta\nflop\tof\tA\n-A\n-10\n.\tBoth\tplayers\tflopped\tfull\thouses,\tbut\tof\tcourse\tFarha’s\twas\tbest.\nTwo\tchecks\tbrought\tabout\tthe\tQ\n\ton\tthe\tturn\tand\tthen\tFarha\tchecked\tfor\ta\tsecond\ttime\tbefore\tHudson\nbet\t300.\tFarha\tcheck-raised\tto\t1,300,\tHudson\tshoved\tall-in,\tand\tFarha\tsnap-called.\tHudson\twatched\nhelplessly\tas\ta\tmeaningless\tjack\twas\tput\tout\ton\tthe\triver\tand,\tjust\tlike\tthat,\the\tbecame\tthe\tfirst\tplayer\neliminated\tfrom\tthe\ttournament.\n“First\thand,\tthat’s\tit.\tHoly\tshit,”\tHudson\tsaid\tin\tdisbelief.\t“That’s\tthe\tway\tto\tget\tbeat\tI\tguess.”\nHands\tlike\tthat,\twhile\tuncommon,\twere\tdemonstrative\tof\tplayers’\twillingness\tto\tshove\tall-in\tat\tthe\ntime\tof\tthe\tpoker\tboom.\tThen,\tstarting\taround\t2008,\tthings\tbegan\tto\tchange\twith\tthe\trise\tof\t“small\tball,”\ta\nstyle\tof\tpoker\tutilized\tby\tplayers\tsuch\tDan\tHarrington\tand\tDaniel\tNegreanu.\nSmall\tball\tis\tan\tadvanced\tstrategy\tfor\tmulti-table\ttournaments\t(MTTs)\tin\twhich\ta\tplayer\taggressively\nplays\ta\twide\trange\tof\tstarting\thands,\tbut\tdoes\tso\twith\tsmall\tbets\tand\traises\tto\tguard\tagainst\tlosing\tlarge\namounts\tof\tchips\ton\tany\tindividual\thand.\tThe\tstrategy,\twhich\twas\tfirst\tintroduced\tin\tthe\tHarrington\ton\nHold’em\tbooks\tand\tlater\tpopularized\tby\tNegreanu,\tis\tbest\tused\tin\tdeepstack\tsituations\tbecause\tit\tallows\nplayers\tto\tgain\tinformation\tover\tmultiple\tbetting\trounds\twithout\tputting\ttheir\ttournament\tlife\ton\tthe\tline.\nThe\tkey\tto\tplaying\tsmall\tball\tis\tto\tcontrol\tthe\tsize\tof\tthe\tpot,\tbecause\tbets\ton\teach\tstreet\tare\nproportional\tto\tthe\tsize\tof\tthe\tpot.\tAs\tsuch,\tpoker\tsaw\ta\tshift\tin\tthe\tsize\tof\tpreflop\traises.\tAs\tpreviously\nmentioned,\tthe\tstandard\topening\traise\tused\tto\tbe\t3BB-4BB\t–\tas\tFarha\thad\tdone\tagainst\tHudson\t–\tbut\nwith\tsmall\tball,\tthe\tstandard\tamount\tgradually\tdecreased.\nYou\tcan’t\treally\tblame\tHudson\tfor\tgetting\tit\tin\tback\tin\t2005.\tPlayers\tthrew\tcaution\tto\tthe\twinds\tback\nthen,\tand\tthe\tstacks\twere\ta\tbit\tshallower.\tThat\tsaid,\tin\ttoday’s\tgame\tyou’d\tnever\tsee\tan\texperienced\tpro\ngo\tbroke\tin\tthat\tspot\tin\tthe\tfirst\thand\tof\tthe\ttournament.\tDeeper\tstarting\tstacks\taside,\tplayers\ttoday\tare\ta\nbit\twarier\tof\ttheir\topponent’s\tholding.\nThere’s\tno\tdoubt\tHudson\tflopped\ta\tmonster,\tbut\tboth\tpocket\taces\tand\tA-10\twere\tbeating\thim.\nLikewise,\twhen\tthey\tboth\tchecked\tand\ta\tqueen\tappeared\ton\tthe\tturn,\tsuddenly\tpocket\tqueens\tand\tA-Q\nwere\talso\tahead.\tThose\tare\tfour\thands\tFarha\tcould\thave\theld,\tand\tsmall\tball\tplayers\twould\tbe\twell\naware\tof\tthis.\tAs\tsuch,\tthey\twouldn’t\tbe\tso\teager\tto\tplay\ta\tpot\tfor\ttheir\tentire\tstack.\tInstead,\tthey’d\nslowly\tlook\tto\tbuild\ta\tpot,\tbut\tonce\tthey\twere\tmet\twith\tresistance,\tthey’d\teither\tgive\tit\tup\tor\ttry\tto\tcontrol\nthe\tsize\tof\tthe\tpot.\nThere\tare\tstill\tplayers\tout\tthere\twho\twill\trecklessly\tcommit\twith\tany\thand\tthey\tperceive\tas\tstrong,\tbut\nmore\tplayers\thave\tlearned\tto\tadapt\tand\tpick\ttheir\tspots\tmore\tcarefully.\nPreflop\taggression\t–\tJoe\tTehan’s\tepic\tshove\twith\t4-2\nPoker\tis\tnot\ta\tgame\tfor\tthe\ttimid.\tIn\torder\tto\tsucceed\tyou\tmust\texhibit\taggression,\twhich\tis\tsomething\nDoyle\tBrunson\tpreached\tback\tin\tthe\t1970s.\tHowever,\twith\tmore\tplayers\ttaking\tan\taggressive\tapproach\tto\nthe\tgame,\tit’s\timperative\tthat\tyou\tstrike\tjust\tthe\tri \ttable,\tMartin\tJacobson\topened\tfor\t3.6\tmillion\nfrom\tthe\tsmall\tblind\tholding\tA\n-A\n\tand\tNorway’s\tFelix\tStephensen\tdefended\this\tbig\tblind\twith\tK\n-J\n.\nThe\t10\n-7\n-5\n\tflop\tsaw\tJacobson\tcontinue\tfor\t4\tmillion.\n“I\tthink\twe’ll\tsee\ta\tfloat\there\tto\tbe\thonest,”\tAntonio\tEsfandiari\tsaid\ton\tcommentary.\t“Just\tbecause\tyou\nhave\ttwo\tovercards,\talso\tif\tyour\topponent\tmissed,\tit\treally\tputs\thim\ton\tdefense\tonce\tyou\tcall\tthe\tflop\tone\ntime…\tA\tfloat\tis\twhen\tyou\tcall\twith\tnothing,\tor\ta\thand\tthat\thas\tpotential\tbut\tnothing\tat\tthe\tcurrent\nmoment,\tin\twhich\tyou\tcan\ttake\tit\taway\tat\ta\tlater\tstreet\tfrom\tyour\topponent.”', \tlost.\tThe\thand\tin\tquestion\twas\ta\tbig-time\tcooler,\tand\tthen\tit\tstruck\tme,\tthe\tgame\thad\tevolved\tso\nmuch\tthat\tplayers\tare\tnow\tcapable\tof\tgetting\taway\tfrom\ttruly\tsick\thands.\tSalter\twas\tdisappointed\nbecause\the\tfelt\the\tcould\thave\tfolded\tand\tfound\ta\tbetter\tspot\tto\tcommit\this\tchips.\nHere’s\twhat\thappened.\tOn\tHand\t#85\tof\tthe\tfinal\ttable,\twhich\ttook\tplace\tin\tLevel\t25\t(25,000/50,000-\n5,000),\tSalter,\twho\twas\tsitting\twith\t4.56\tmillion,\traised\tto\t105,000\tfrom\tthe\tbutton\tholding\tQ\n-10\n.', ze\tof\tthe\tpot.\tBeing\table\tto\tmake\tthe\tpot\tgrow\tlarge\twhen\tyou\nhave\ta\thigh\tchance\tof\twinning\tis\tcrucial\tto\tplaying\tgreat\tpoker.\tLikewise,\tthe\tvalue\tof\tkeeping\tthe\tpot\nsize\tunder\tcontrol\twhen\tthe\todds\taren’t\tin\tyour\tfavor\tshould\tnot\tbe\tunderestimated.\tPots\tgrow\nexponentially\tin\tno-limit\thold’em,\twhich\tmakes\tthis\tbenefit\tof\tposition\textremely\timportant.', e\tyour\tfriend\tso\the\tcan\tbust\tyou!”\nI\thad\tto\tlaugh\tas\tshe\twent\ton\tto\texplain\thow\tshe’d\tbeen\tin\tmy\tpoker\tcamp\tand\tso\tknew\twhat\tI\twas\tup\nto.\tAnd\tsure\tenough,\tthe\tguy\tdidn’t\tsay\tanother\tword\tto\tme!\nGetting\tcalled\tout\tlike\tthat\tis\trare,\tof\tcourse.\tMore\toften\tthan\tnot,\tyou’ll\tfind\tthat\tplayers\twill\tgladly\nopen\tup\tto\tyou,\teven\tafter\tplay\tbegins\tsometimes,\tletting\tyou\tknow\tin\tvarious\tways\twhether\tthey\tare\nseasoned\ttournament\tplayers\tor\trelative\tnewcomers.\tKnowing,\tfor\tinstance,\tthat\ta\tplayer\tonly\noccasionally\tplays\t$1/$2\tno-limit\thold’em\tcash\tgames\tand\tfew\ttournaments,\tyou’ll\tfind\tit\teasier\tto\tblow', gh\tit\tis\tto\tmake\ta\tpair\tin\tno-limit\thold’em.\tBut\the\tis\tabsolutely\tright,\tand\tthat’s\twhy\ncontinuation\tbetting\tand\taggression\tis\tso\timportant.\nBy\tthe\tend\tof\ta\tcouple\tof\torbits,\tyou\tshould\thave\talready\tworked\tout\twho\tthe\tweaker\tplayers\tare\tand\nfurther\tworked\ton\tplacing\tsome\tor\tall\tof\tthem\tinto\tthese\tsubcategories.\tMeanwhile,\talso\tpay\tattention\tto\nthe\tstronger\tplayers,\tthe\tones\twho\tunderstand\tthat\taggression\tis\tneeded\tto\twin.\tYou’re\twatching\tto\tsee\nwho\tis\tmost\tactive,\twho\tis\t3-betting,\twho\tis\tcapable\tof\tcheck-raising\tor\tmaking\tother\tnon-passive\tplays,', \tis\tvery\tindicative\tof\tthe\tbettor’s\thand\tstrength.\tFor\texample\tthis\t700\tbet\tis\nusually\tindicative\tof\ta\tweak\ttop\tpair\ttype\thand\twhereas\ta\thand\tlike\tA-Q\tmay\tbet\tcloser\tto\t1,500\tor\thalf\nthe\tpot.\nMany\tplayers\tat\tthis\tlevel\thave\ta\thard\ttime\tfolding\tpairs,\tespecially\tpocket\tpairs.\tAs\tlong\tas\tthe\tbet\nsizes\tstay\twithin\treason,\tthey\twill\tusually\tfind\ta\tcall.\tFacing\ta\tbet\tand\ta\tcall\ton\tthe\tflop,\tit\tis\tprobably\nsmart\tto\tfold\thands\tsuch\tas\tpocket\tpairs,\tas\tthe\tlojack\tdid\twith\t10-10,\tand\teven\tmarginal\tmade\thands,\nsuch\tas\tJ\n-8\n.\tNotice\tthat\tthe\tbutton\toften\thas\tsome\treverse\timplied\todds\tbecause\tif\the\timproves\tto\ttwo\npair\tor\ttrips,\the\tmay\tnot\tget\tpaid\toff\tand\the\tcould\teasily\tbe\tdominated,\tresulting\tin\thim\tlosing\ta\tlarge\tpot.\nThe\tturn\tis\tthe\t(Q\n-8\n-3\n)-7\n.\tThe\tpot\tis\t5,300.\nThird\tposition\tagain\tbets\t700.\tBoth\tthe\tlojack\tand\tthe\tbutton\tcall.\tThe\tpot\tis\tnow\t7,400.\nThe\tplayer\twho\tbet\tout\ton\tthe\tflop\twill\toften\tlead\tagain\ton\tthe\tturn\twhen\ta\tsafe\tcard\tcomes\tand\twill\ncheck\twhen\ta\tscare\tcard,\tsuch\tas\tan\tA\tor\tK,\tcomes.\tFor\tsome\treason,\tmany\trecreational\tplayers\twill\tbet\nthe\tsame\tamount\ton\tthe\tturn\tas\tthey\tdid\ton\tthe\tflop.\tThis\tis\tusually\tan\tobvious\tgiveaway\tthat\tthey\tare\nconcerned\tthat\ttheir\thand\tcould\tbe\tbeat.\tHowever,\tthis\tdoes\tnot\tmean\tthey\twill\tfold\tto\taggression.\tIt\tis\nworth\tnoting\tthat\tvery\tfew\trecreational\tplayers\twill\tcheck-raise\tin\tthis\tspot\tas\ta\tbluff.\nA\t700\tbet\ton\tthe\tturn\tis\tvery\tsmall\tcompared\tto\tthe\t5,300\tpot.\tWhen\tfacing\tsuch\ta\ttiny\tbet,\tit\tis\tusually\nokay\tto\tcontinue\tcalling\twhen\tyou\tthink\tyou\thave\tsome\touts.\tEven\tthough\tthe\tlojack\tand\tbutton\tprobably\nassume\tthey\tare\tbehind\tat\tthe\tmoment,\tthey\tshould\tcall\tat\tthis\tpoint\tdue\tto\ttheir\tbig\tpot\todds.\tIf\tth  Document(page_content='marginal\tA,\tsuch\tas\tA\n-10\n\tthat\tsomehow\tfloated\tthe\tflop,\tthey\twould\tlikely\tnot\tvalue\tbet\ton\tthe\triver.\nYou\twill\tfind\tthat\tmost\tsmall\tbuy-in\tplayers\tare\tafraid\tto\tbet\twith\tnon-nut\thands\tfor\tvalue\ton\tthe\triver,\nespecially\tin\tmultiway\tpots.\tWhile\tit\tis\tdifficult\tto\tsay\tif\tthird\tposition\twould\tfold\twhen\tfacing\ta\triver\nbet,\tdo\tnot\tbe\tshocked\tif\the\tmakes\ta\thero\tcall\tsimply\tbecause\the\tthinks\the\thas\ta\tgood\thand.\tAlways\tpay\nattention\tto\tthe\tway\tyour\topponents’\tplay\tbefore\tdeciding\tto\tattempt\ta\trisky\tbluff.\nHand\t1,\thigh\tbuy-in\nThe\tplayer\tin\tfirst\tposition\tfolds\twith\tA\n-7\n.\tSecond\tposition\talso\tfolds\tK\n-5\n.\tThird\tposition\tfolds\this\tQ\n-6\n.\tFourth\tposition\tfolds\n-8\n-2\n.\tThe\tlojack\traises\tto\t125\twith\t5\n-3\n.\tThe\thijack\tcalls\twith\t10\n-10\n.\tThe\tcutoff\tcalls\twith\t10\n-9\n.\tThe\tbutton\tcalls\twith\tJ\n-8\n.\tThe\tsmall\tblind\tfolds\t9\n-4\n\tand\tthe\tbig\tblind\tfolds\t7\n-6\n.\tThe\tpot\tis\t625.\nIn\thigh\tstakes\ttournaments,\tmost\tplayers\tare\tpositionally\taware,\tmeaning\tthey\tknow\tto\tfold\tmost\tof\ntheir\tmarginal\tholdings\tfrom\tearly\tposition\tbecause\tit\tis\ttoo\tlikely\tthat\tsomeone\tyet\tto\tact\thas\ta\tstrong\nhand.\tCompared\tto\tthe\tsmall\tstakes\texample,\tthis\tresults\tin\tthe\tinitial\tpreflop\traise\tsize\tbeing\tmuch\nsmaller,\t125\tcompared\tto\t400.\tOnce\tthere\tis\ta\tsmall\tinitial\traise,\twhen\tstacks\tare\tdeep\tyou\tshould\texpect\nmost\tplayers\tto\tcall\twith\tany\tsort\tof\thand\tthat\thas\treasonable\tpostflop\tpotential.\nThe\tflop\tcomes\tQ?-8?-3?.\tThe\tpot\tis\t650.\nEveryone\tchecks\tto\tthe\tbutton\twho\tbets\t350\twith\this\tmiddle\tpair.\tOnly\tthe\thijack\tand\tcutoff\tcall.\tThe\tpot\tis\t1,675.\nWith\tfour\tplayers\tseeing\tthe\tflop,\tthe\tinitial\traiser\tis\tcorrect\tto\tcheck\tbottom\tpair\tbecause\tit\tis\tsimply\ntoo\tlikely\tthat\tsomeone\tyet\tto\tact\thas\ta\tbetter\tpair.\tSome\tplayers\twould\tbet\twith\t10-10;\tothers\twould\tpot\ncontrol\tby\tchecking\tand\tcalling.\tThe\tbutton\tmade\tan\texcellent\tbet\tboth\tfor\tvalue\tand\tto\tprotect\this\thand\nfrom\tvarious\tovercards,\tsuch\tas\tK-10,\tthat\thave\tdecent\tequity\tversus\this\tmiddle\tpair.\nIn\tgeneral,\twhen\tyou\tsee\tflop\taction\tlike\tthis,\ta\tstrong\tplay\tis\tto\tcheck-raise\tthe\tlast\tposition\tbettor\nwith\ta\twide\trange\tbecause\tmost\tplayers\tin\tlast\tposition\twill\tat\tleast\tconsider\ttaking\ta\tstab\tat\tthe\tflop\twith\na\twide\trange\tbecause\teveryone\telse\tshowed\tweakness.\tIf\tyou\tpick\tyour\tspots\twell,\tyou\twill\tbe\table\tto\nsteal\tthis\tpot\ta\thuge\tpercentage\tof\tthe\ttime.\nGetting\texcellent\tpot\todds\tplus\timplied\todds,\tthe\tcutoff\tcalled\tin\thopes\tof\tgetting\tlucky\tand\thitting\this\ngutshot\tstraight\tdraw\tor\tturning\tmore\touts.\nThe\tturn\tis\tthe\t(Q\n-8\n-3\n)-7\n.\tThe\tpot\tis\t1,675.\nLojack\tand\thijack\tcheck.\tThe\tcutoff\tbets\t1,100.\tEveryone\tfolds,\tgiving\tthe\tcutoff\tthe\tpot.\nThe\tturn\tcard\tdoesn’t\tchange\tmuch\tfor\tanyone\tbesides\tthe\tcutoff,\twho\tdrastically\timproved\this\tdraw.\nHe\tdecided\tto\tbet,\twhich\tmay\tor\tmay\tnot\tbe\ta\tgood\tplay,\tdepending\ton\twhat\the\tthinks\tabout\tthe\tbutton’s\nflop\tbetting\trange.\tIf\the\texpects\tthe\tbutton\tto\tbet\tthe\tflop\twith\ta\twide\trange,\tleading\ton\tthe\tturn\twill\toften\nforce\thim\tto\tfold\tunless\the\thas\ttop\tpair\tor\tbetter.\tSince\tthe\thijack\tdidn’t\tshow\tmuch\tinterest\ton\tthe\tflop,\nhe\tprobably\talso\thas\ta\tmarginal\thand.\tBy\tbetting\tinto\this\topponents,\the\tgives\thimself\ta\tchance\tto\tsteal\tthe\npot\ton\tthe\tturn\tand\talso\tbuilds\ta\tpot\tthat\the\tmay\tbe\table\tto\twin\ton\tthe\triver\tby\teither\timproving\tor\nbluffing.\nWhen\tthe\tcutoff\tleads\ton\tthe\tturn,\tskilled\tplayers\twill\tassume\tthat\tthe\tleader\timproved\teither\tto\ta\npremium\tmade\thand\tor\ta\t pots\tfolded\tuneventfully\ton\tthe\tturn.\nIf\tyou’ve\ttried\tto\tmove\tup\tin\tthe\tpast\tand\tfailed,\tI’m\there\tto\thelp.\tI\tpresent\tseven\tsimple\tsteps\tto\tmove\nup\tin\tstakes.\tIf\tyou\tfollow\tthis\tseven\tstep\tapproach,\tyou\twill\tclimb\twith\tyour\teyes\topen.\tI\tcan’t\tguarantee\nthat\tyou’ll\tsucceed.\tThe\tgoing\tgets\ttougher\tat\tevery\tstep\t–\tand\tthere’s\talways\ta\tlot\tof\twork\tto\tdo\tto\tget\nfrom\there\tto\tthere.\nHowever,\tI\tcan\tpromise\tthat\tyou\twon’t\tbe\tblindsided.\tIf\tyou\tstruggle,\tyou\tshould\tbe\table\tto\tdetermine\nthe\treason\tby\tgoing\tthrough\tthe\tsteps\tin\tthis\tchapter.\tWorking\tthrough\tthe\tproblems\tsystematically\twill\nhelp\tyou\tto\tsucceed.\nSo\there\tare\tmy\tseven\tsteps\tto\tmoving\tup\tin\tstakes…\tand\tstaying\tthere.', o\tmove\tup.\nWork\ton\tyour\tgame\tat\tyour\tcurrent\tlevel.\tAnalyze\tyour\topponents.\tFigure\tout\tnew\tways\tto\texploit\tthem,\nand\ttry\tthem\tout.\tIf\tthey\tseem\tto\twork,\twrite\tthem\tdown.\nNot\tonly\twill\tthis\texercise\tprepare\tyou\tto\tmove\tto\tthe\tnext\tlevel,\tbut\tit\twill\timprove\tyour\tperformance\nat\tyour\tcurrent\tlevel\tas\twell.\tThis\tis\tprecisely\tthe\tsort\tof\twork\tthat\tseparates\tthose\twho\treach\ttheir\tpoker\ngoals\tfrom\tthose\twho\tflounder.', os,\tif\tthey\tare\tpaying\tattention,\twill\neventually\trealize\tthat\tI’m\tmaking\tthe\tcalls\twith\tdifferent\tranges\tand\tadjust\taccordingly,\twhich\twill\tforce\nme\tto\trevert\tback\tto\ta\tfairly\tstandard\t3-bet\tor\tfold\tstrategy.\nTough\tand\tsoft\ttournaments\nIn\ta\trecent\tmajor\tlarge\tbuy-in\ttournament,\twe\twere\tnear\tthe\tbubble\twhen\ta\tgood,\tbut\tsuper-loose\naggressive,\tplayer\traised\tto\t2BB\tfrom\tmiddle\tposition.\tI\twas\ton\tthe\tbutton\tand\tsimply\tcalled\twith\tA-K.\nTo\tmost\tplayers,\tthis\tis\tan\tautomatic\tre-raise\tsituation.\tI\tthink\tthis\tis\tan\texcellent\tcalling\tsituation.\tIf\tyou\nre-raise,\tthe\tsuper\tloose\taggressive\tplayer\twill\toften\tcall\tand\tput\tyou\tin\ta\ttricky\tsituations\tafter\tthe\tflop.\nBy\tcalling,\tI\tallowed\tmyself\tto\tsee\ta\tflop\tin\tposition\twith\ta\tdisguised\trange.\nHowever,\tif\tthis\twas\ta\tsoft\tonline\ttournament,\tsuch\tas\tthe\t$200\tSunday\tMillion\ton\tPokerStars,\tI\twould\nbe\tmuch\tmore\tprone\tto\tre-raise\tor\teven\tgo\tall-in.\tIn\tthis\tscenario,\tmy\topponents\twill\tbe\tmuch\tmore\ninclined\tto\tget\tall-in\twith\tnumerous\thands\tI\thave\tdominated.\tIt\tis\timportant\tto\tthink\tabout\tthe\ttype\tof\nmistakes\tyour\topponents\tare\tlikely\tto\tmake\tand\tadjust\tyour\tstrategy\tto\ttake\tadvantage\tof\tthem.\nWhile\tthis\tmay\tat\tfirst\tglance\tseem\tcounter-intuitive,\tthere\tis\tmore\tvalue\tin\tconserving\tyour\tstack\tin\ta\nsoft\ttournament\tthan\tin\ta\ttough\ttournament.\tBy\tre-raising,\tyou\tmake\tit\tless\tlikely\tto\tfind\tyourself\tin\ta\ndifficult\tsituation\twhen\tyou\tare\tfacing\tweak\tcompetition.\nIn\tsoft\ttournaments,\tyou\tare\toften\table\tto\tslowly\tgrind\tup\tyour\tstack\tby\tstealing.\tThis\tmakes\tplaying\nany\tmeaningful\tsize\tpot\tpostflop\ta\tbad\tidea.\tIn\ttough\ttournaments,\tit\tis\tdifficult\tto\tsteal.\tYou\thave\tto\tbe\nwilling\tto\ttake\tmore\trisks\tto\tsee\tflops\tin\tposition.\tIf\tyou\tplay\tpoorly\tafter\tthe\tflo \topponent\traising\tfrom\tthe\tcutoff\tposition\tto\tsee\nhow\tthis\tmath\tworks.\tIn\tthis\texample,\tlet’s\tassume\tthe\tcutoff\twill\topen\t30.32%\tof\thands.\t30.32%\tof\tall\nhands\tincludes\tall\tpairs,\tsuited\taces,\tA-6o+,\tK-9o+,\tQ-9o+,\tJ-10o+,\tK-7s+,\tQ-8s+,\tJ-8s+,\t10-8s+,\t9-7s,\n8-7s,\t6-5s.\tThis\tis\ta\tgood\tbase\tpoint\tfor\tloose\tplayers\t–\tsome\twill\topen\tmore,\tsome\tless.\tFor\tour\t3-bet\tto\nwork\tin\tthe\tabove\tscenario,\tthe\tplayer\tmust\tshove\tless\tthan\t53%\tof\tthe\ttime.\tBy\tmultiplying\t53%\tby\n30.32%,\twe\tfind\tthat\tour\topponent\tmust\tshove\t16%\tof\thands\tto\tbreak\teven.\t16%\tof\tall\tpoker\thands\nincludes:\t7-7+,\tA-10o+,\tA-5s+,\tK-9s+,\tQ-9s+,\tJ-10s+,\tK-10o+,\tQ-Jo+.\tThe\tpoint\tof\tthis\texample\tis\tto\nrealize\thow\tmuch\tof\tthe\topening\trange\tthe\topponent\tmust\tshove.\tTake\ta\tlook\tat\tthose\thands.\tOur\topponent\nneeds\tto\tshove\thands\tas\tweak\tas\tQ-9s,\tK-10o,\tand\tA-5s\tin\torder\tfor\tus\tnot\tto\texploit\tthe\toriginal\traise.\nMany\topponents\twill\tnot\ttake\ton\tthe\tvariance\tinvolved\twith\tshoving\tweak\thands\tsuch\tas\tQ-9s\tand\tK-10o.\nIt\tis\timportant\tthat\tyou\tget\tcomfortable\twith\ttools\tlike\tPokerstove,\ta\tprogram\tto\tcalculate\tranges\tthat\tI\nused\tto\tfind\tthe\tabove\thands,\tin\torder\tto\tlearn\thow\tto\tevaluate\tranges.\nThe\ttype\tof\tplayers\tyou\tdo\tnot\twant\tto\tperform\tthis\tmove\tagainst\twould\tbe\tplayers\twho\toften\tflat\tcall\n3-bets.\tAgainst\tthis\ttype\tof\tplayer,\tour\thand\tmatters\tmuch\tmore.\tWe\tneed\ta\thand\tthat\thas\tat\tleast\tsome\npotential\tto\tconnect\twith\tthe\tflop,\tsuch\tas\ta\tbig\tsuited\tconnectors\tor\tBroadway\thands.\tWhen\tyou\tcan\nidentify\tthe\tcorrect\tplayers\tagainst\twhom\tto\texecute\tleveraging\t3-bets,\tyou\twill\thave\ta\tpowerful\ttool\tfor\ntaking\tdown\tbloated\tpots\tpreflop\twith\tlittle\tconfrontation\tor\trisk.\nLeveraging\tand\tbet-sizing\nA\tmajor\tpart\tof\tleveraging\tin\ttournaments\tis\tlearning\tto\tuse\tthe\tcorrect\tbet-sizing.\tBet-sizing\tis\tperhaps\nthe\tleast\tthought\tabout\taspect\tof\tpoker,\tbut\tit\tcan\toften\tbe\tthe\tmost\timportant\tdecision\tin\ta\thand.\tMany\nplayers\tfail\tto\trecognize\thow\tmany\toptions\tthey\thave\twith\tbet-sizing.\tThese\toptions\tare\tparticularly\nimportant\twhen\tstack\tsizes\tbecome\tshallower\tnear\tthe\tend\tof\ttournaments.\tLike\teverything\telse\twe\thave\ndiscussed\tso\tfar,\tyou\tshould\talways\tbe\tasking\twhy\tyou\tare\tchoosing\ta\tparticular\tsizing.\tWhat\tare\tyou\ntrying\tto\taccomplish\twith\tthis\tsizing?\tWhat\tare\tthe\treasons\tfor\tusing\ta\tsmall\tsizing\tversus\ta\tlarger\tsizing?', old.\tIf\twe\thappened\tto\nturn\ttop\tpair\tthis\tspot\tinstead\tof\thaving\tK-Q,\twe\tshould\tstill\tchoose\ta\tsizing\tof\taround\t9,000.\tThe\tfear\tof\nan\tupcoming\tall-in\triver\tbet\tis\toften\tenough\tto\tdiscourage\tcalls\tand\tforce\tyour\topponent\tto\trisk\tall\ttheir\nchips\tor\tfold,\twhile\twe\tonly\thave\tto\trisk\taround\t1/3\tof\tour\tstack.\nIt\tis\timportant\tto\tbe\table\tto\tfigure\tout\tif\tyour\topponent\tis\tthe\ttype\tof\tplayer\twho\tis\tcapable\tof\tfolding\non\tthe\triver\tafter\tcalling\tflop\tand\tturn\tbets\tor\tif\tthey\twill\tnever\tfold\ton\tthe\triver\tin\tthis\tsituation.\nIdentifying\twhich\tplayers\twill\tand\twon’t\tfold\tin\thigh\tpressure\triver\tsituations\tis\tmandatory\tfor\tleveraging\nyour\tturn\tbets.\tAgainst\topponents\twho\tfrequently\tcall\tthe\tflop,\tcall\tthe\tturn\tand\tthen\tfold\tthe\triver,\tyou\tcan\nuse\ta\tturn\tsizing\tthat\tsets\tup\ta\tperfect\triver\tshove\tto\tget\ta\tgreat\tprice\ton\tstealing\tthe\tpot.\tAgainst\tplayers\nwho\tlike\tto\tfold\tor\tmove\tall-in\ton\tthe\tturn,\tchoose\ta\tsizing\tthat\tforces\tthem\tto\tmake\ta\tdecision\tfor\tall\tof\ntheir\tchips.\tBy\tbetting\t1/3\ttheir\tstack,\tregardless\tof\tthe\tpot\tsize,\tyou\tgive\tyourself\ta\tgreat\tprice\ton\nstealing\tthe\tpot.\tBe\tsure\tto\tuse\tthe\tsame\tsizing\twith\tyour\thands\tthat\twill\tcall\tthe\tshove\tso\tyou\tdon’t\nbecome\teasy\tto\tread.\nBeing\table\tto\tchoose\tthe\tcorrect\tbet-sizing\tin\torder\tto\tleverage\tyour\topponents’\tchip\tstack\tis\tone\tof\tthe\nmost\tcrucial\taspects\tof\ttournaments.\tThis\tis\tunlike\tcash\tgames,\twhere\tplayers\tcan\tbuy\tin\tfor\ta\thuge\nnumber\tof\tbig\tblinds\tand\tnever\tface\tan\tall-in\tsituation.\tIn\tany\tgiven\ttournament\thand\tyou\tcan\tmake\tyour\nopponent\trisk\this\tentire\ttournament\tlife.\tWhether\tit\tis\tby\tshoving\tall-in\tpreflop,\tor\tbetting\thalf\tof\tan\nopponent’s\tstack,\tit\tis\toften\tthe\tstack\tsize\tof\tthe\topponent\tand\tnot\tthe\tsize\tof\tthe\tpot,\tthat\tshould\tdictate\nhow\tmuch\twe\tbet.\tThis\tis\tan\tadditional\tpart\tof\tmy\tassessment\tof\tthe\ttable\teach\torbit.\tMake\tsure\tthat\tyou\nhave\ta\tgood\tidea\tof\tyour\topponents’\tchip\tstacks\tbefore\tyou\tenter\ta\tpot.\nTournament\tstages', he\tpot.\tIf\tyou\twere\tto\tshove\tall-in\tand\tyour\topponent\tfolds,\tyou\twould\tadd\t25%\tto\tyour\nstack.\tThis\tis\tmassive!\tWhen\tyou\tcan\tadd\t25%\tto\tyour\tstack\twith\ta\tsuccessful\tsteal,\tgoing\tall-in\tis\talmost\ncertainly\tbetter\tthan\tcalling\tand\tseeing\ta\tflop.\nIt\tmay\tbe\thard\tto\tgrasp,\tbut\tthere\tare\tsituations\twhere\tmoving\tall-in\tis\tactually\tthe\tlowest\tvariance\nplay\tdue\tto\tyour\tfold\tequity.\tWhen\tyou\tare\tin\tthe\tblinds\twith\tan\tM\tbetween\tsix\tand\teight\tand\thave\tan\naggressive\tcutoff\tor\tbutton\twho\traises\tmost\tpots\twhen\tfolded\tto,\tthere\tare\tstrong\targuments\tyou\tcan\tmake\nfor\tshoving\twithout\tlooking\tat\tyour\tcards.\tThis\tis\tbecause\twhen\the\tfolds,\tyou\tadd\tanywhere\tfrom\t25%\tto\n33%\tto\tyour\tstack.\tIf\tyou\tdo\tthis\tthree\ttimes,\tyou\tdouble\tup!\tWhen\tyou\tcan\tfind\tplayers\twho\traise\tpreflop\na\tlot,\tbut\tlack\tthe\tability\tto\tcall\tan\tall-in\twith\tmarginal\thands,\tinstantly\tprofitable\tall-in\tspots\tare\npresented\tto\tyou.\tA\tplayer\twho\tis\topening\ttoo\tmany\thands\tfrom\tthe\tcutoff\tor\tbutton\twill\tnot\thave\ta\tstrong\nhand\toften\tenough\tto\tcall\tyour\tall-in,\tthus\tmaking\tthis\tplay\tvery\tprofitable,\tespecially\tif\tyou\thave\ta\ttight\nimage,\tgiving\tyou\teven\tmore\tfold\tequity.\nWhile\tthe\tsize\tof\tthe\tantes\twill\taffect\tyour\tM,\tit\tshould\talso\taffect\tmany\tof\tyour\tpreflop\tdecisions.\nWhen\tthe\tantes\tare\tbig,\tyou\tshould\tbe\tmore\tprone\tto\ttry\tto\tsteal\tthe\tblinds\tbefore\tthe\tflop.\tWith\tsmall\nantes,\tyou\tshould\tbe\ta\tbit\ttighter.\tA\tcommon\tlevel\twhere\ttournaments\tdifferentiate\tthe\tante\tis\tat\tthe\n3,000/6,000\tlevel.\tYou\twill\tfind\tthat\tthere\tis\teither\ta\t500\tor\t1,000\tante.\tLet’s\tassume\tyou\thave\tan\taverage\n30BB\tstack\tof\t180,000.\tThe\tM\tin\tthe\t500\texample\twould\tbe\t180/14\t=12.85\tversus\tthe\t1,000\tante\tM\tof\n180/19\t=\t9.47.\tAs\tyou\tcan\tsee,\twhen\tthe\tantes\tar beta\tof\t1\twould\tincrease\tin\tvalue\tby\t10%\twhen\tthe\tmarket\nincreases\t10%.\tWith\ta\tbeta\tof\t1.5,\tif\tthe\tmarket\tincreased\tby\t10%\tthis\tparticularly\triskier\tstock\twould\nincrease\tby\t15%,\tthus\tproviding\tmore\treturn\tthan\tthe\tmarket.\tThe\topposite\talso\tholds\ttrue,\twhen\tthe\nmarket\tfalls\tby\t10%,\tthis\t1.5\tbeta\tstock\twould\tdecrease\tby\t15%.\tStocks\twith\tless\tthan\t1\tbeta\tare\tless\nvolatile\tthen\tthe\tmarket.\tA\t0.7\tbeta\tstock\twould\tonly\tyield\ta\treturn\tof\t7%\tfor\ta\t10%\tmarket\tincrease,\tbut\nwould\talso\tonly\tfall\t7%\twhen\tthe\tmarket\tfalls.\tThere\tare\teven\tnegative\tbeta\tstocks\tthat\twould\tincrease\tin\nvalue\twhen\tthe\tmarket\tfalls,\tbut\talso\tdecrease\twhen\tthe\tmarket\trises.\tAny\ttype\tof\tinsurance\tis\ta\tgreat\nexample\tof\ta\tnegative\tbeta\tinvestment.\tThe\tkey\tpoint\tto\tunderstand\tis\tthat\tmore\trisk\toffers\tmore\treturn,\nbut\talso\tmore\tvolatility.\tIn\tfinance,\tinvestors\tcreate\tportfolios\tof\tstocks\tto\thelp\teliminate\tthe\trisk\tof\tbeta\nby\thaving\tsome\tlow\tbeta\tstocks,\thigh\tbeta\tstocks,\tand\teven\tnegative\tbeta\tstocks.\tThey\tideally\tcreate\nportfolios\tthat\tare\timmune\tto\tthe\tups\tand\tdowns\tof\tthe\tmarket,\twhile\talso\tstill\tmaximizing\ttheir\treturn\ton\ninvestment.\nWe\tcan\teasily\trelate\tthese\tterms\tback\tto\ttournament\tpoker.\tLet’s\tstart\twith\tbeta.\tThis\tis\tmuch\tlike\nplaying\ttight\tversus\tplaying\tloose.\tA\ttight\tplayer\tis\tjust\tlike\ta\tlow\tbeta\tstock,\tmeaning\tthey\thave\tless\nvolatility\tin\ttheir\tstack,\tbut\talso\tmay\thave\tless\treturn\ton\tinvestment\tdue\tto\trelatively\tlittle\trisk.\tA\tloose\naggressive\tplayer\tis\tlike\ta\thigh\tbeta\tstock.\tThey\ttake\ton\tmore\tvolatility\tin\torder\tto\tincrease\treturns.\nHow\tdoes\tthe\tstandard\tmarket\tin\tfinance\trelate\tto\tpoker?\tI\tconsider\tthe\tmarket\tto\tbe\tthe\tstandard\nvariance\tthat\tevery\tplayer\tis\tsubjected\tto\tin\tpoker.\tFor\texample,\ta\t50/50\tcoin\tflip\twould\tbe\tan\texample\nof\tthe\tstandard\tstock\tmarket\tvariation.\tTying\tit\tall\tback\tin,\ta\ttight\tlow\tbeta\tplayer\twould\tbe\tsubjected\tto\nfewer\tcoin\tflips\tor\tstack\tvolatility\tspots\tthan\ta\thigh\tbeta\tloose\taggressive\tplayer.\tThus,\twhile\tone\tplayer\nhas\tlower\tvariance\tand\tlower\treturn,\tthe\tother\tpossesses\thigher\tvariance\twith\thigher\treturn.\tJust\tlike\tin\nthe\tstock\tmarket,\tneither\tlow\tnor\thigh\tbeta\tstocks\tare\tbad,\tbut\tboth\tforms\tof\tstocks\tshould\tbe\tcombined\tin\norder\tto\tcreate\toptimal\tportfolios\tof\tstocks.\tOur\tportfolio\tof\tstocks\tin\tpoker\tare\tall\tthe\ttools\t(3-betting,', ook\tat\tthe\tdownside\trisk.\tIf\twe\tcall\tand\tlose\tthis\tflip,\twe\thave\tgone\tfrom\t60BB\tto\t30BB.\nWith\t30BB,\tsome\tof\tour\toptions\thave\tbeen\tremoved.\tWe\twill\thave\tto\tbe\tvery\tcautious\twith\tour\tchoices\npreflop\tas\tour\tshorter\tstack\tmay\tput\tus\tin\tmany\tmore\tmarginal\tsituations.\tWe\thave\tto\tbe\tvery\tselective\nand\tsure\tabout\tour\t3-bets\tpreflop\tas\tthey\twill\tcost\tus\ta\tlarge\tpercentage\tof\tour\tstack.\nThese\tsituations,\tin\tthis\tcase,\ta\t30BB\tcoin\tflip,\tcome\tup\tvery\toften\tin\ttournaments.\tThe\tweighing\tof\npros\tand\tcons\tof\teach\tindividual\tsituation\tis\tvital\tin\thelping\tyou\tcome\tto\tthe\tcorrect\tconclusion.\tPerhaps',  Document(page_content='06\nSUCCESS\tIN\tSATELLITES:\tQUALIFY\tFOR\tYOUR\tDREAM\nTOURNAMENT\nIntroduction\nMost\tpoker\tplayers\tdream\tof\tplaying\tin\tthe\tWorld\tSeries\tof\tPoker’s\t(WSOP’s)\tMain\tEvent.\tThis\ntournament,\twhich\tI\toften\trefer\tto\ton\tcable\tchannel\tESPN\tas\tthe\t“Mac\tDaddy”\tof\tpoker,\thas\tbeen\tthe\naspiration\tof\tmillions\tsince\tthe\tincreased\ttelevision\tcoverage\tin\tthe\t2000s.\tPlayers\tdream\tabout\tcapturing\nthe\tfame,\tthe\tfortune\tand\tthe\tmost\tcoveted\tbracelet\tin\tpoker.\nHowever,\tmost\tplayers\tcannot\tplunk\tdown\t$10,000\tfor\ta\tsingle\ttournament.\tThis\textravagant\tamount\tis\nsimply\tbeyond\ttheir\tbankroll\tand\tmeans.\nNevertheless,\tfor\tthe\tpast\tdecade\tthe\tWSOP\tMain\tEvent\thas\tnever\thad\tfewer\tthan\t5,600\tregistrants.\nPrior\tto\t2004\tthere\thad\tnever\tbeen\tmore\tthan\t1,000\tplayers.\tHow\tcould\tthe\tregistration\tnumbers\texplode\nin\ta\tmatter\tof\ta\tcouple\tof\tyears?\tOne\tsingle\tevent\tin\thistory\tchanged\tthe\tgame,\tand\tit\twas\tthe\tdirect\tresult\nof\tthe\tintroduction\tof\tsatellite\ttournaments.\nThe\taccountant\tfrom\tTennessee\twho\twon\tthe\t2003\tWSOP\tMain\tEvent\tqualified\tfor\tthe\ttournament\tvia\na\t$39\tsatellite.\tUltimately,\tChris\tMoneymaker\tconverted\tthis\tsmall\tbuy-in\tamount\tinto\t$2.5\tmillion\tfor\nfirst\tplace,\tsetting\toff\ta\tpoker\tboom\taffectionately\tknown\tas\tthe\t“Moneymaker\tEffect.”\tSince\tthen,\tplayers\nhave\tutilized\tthe\tsatellite\tsystem\tto\tgain\tentry\tinto\tnot\tonly\tthe\tWSOP\tMain\tEvent,\tbut\tother\tlarger\tbuy-in\nevents\taround\tthe\tglobe.\nDuring\tmy\ttravels\taround\tthe\tworld\tover\tthe\tpast\tdecade,\tI\thave\tplayed\tin\tcountless\tsatellites.\tIt\tnever\nceases\tto\tamaze\tme\thow\tpoorly\tplayers\tplay\tsatellites.\tMany\tplayers\tplay\tthem\tidentically\tto\ta\tcustomary\nmulti-table\ttournament\t(MTT).\tOthers\tplay\tso\ttight,\ttrying\tto\tsneak\tinto\tthe\tmoney\t(the\tMain\tEvent\nplaces),\tthat\tthey\tblind\tthemselves\tright\tout\tof\tthe\tsatellite.\tSome\tgather\tan\tenormous\tchip\tlead\tand\ttry\tto\nwin\tall\tthe\tchips,\tonly\tto\tconvert\ttheir\thuge\tstack\tinto\tmassive\tdisappointment.\tEach\tof\tthese\tstrategies\tis\nincorrect,\tleading\tmyriad\tplayers\tto\tfall\tshort\tof\ttheir\tultimate\tgoal.\nIn\tthis\tchapter,\tI\twill\thelp\tyou\trecognize\tthe\tdifference\tbetween\ta\tmulti-table\tsatellite\tand\ta\tstandard\nMTT,\twhile\texplaining\tthe\tbest\tmethod\tof\tqualifying\tfor\tan\tevent\tvia\ta\tsatellite.\tBy\tutilizing\tthe\tconcepts\nand\ttechniques\tin\tthis\tchapter,\tyou\twill\tgive\tyourself\tthe\tbest\topportunity\tto\tqualify\tfor\tthe\tevent\tof\tyour\ndreams,\tmaybe\teven\tthe\tWSOP\tMain\tEvent.\nHistory\nBefore\tI\tbegin\tdiscussing\tthe\tconcepts\tand\tstrategy\trequired\tto\twin\tat\tsatellites,\tlet\tus\tfirst\tlook\tat\tthe\nhistory\tof\tthe\tsatellite.',  Document(page_content='The\tpoker\tboom\tresulted\tfrom\ta\tcombination\tof\tseveral\tfactors\tincluding\tthe\texpansion\tof\tonline\npoker,\tnon-smoking\tpoker\trooms\tand\thole\tcard\tcameras\t(creating\texpanded\ttelevision\tcoverage\tof\npoker).\tAt\tthe\tcenter\tof\tthis\tpoker\texplosion\twas\tthe\timprobable\trun\tof\tthe\t2003\tWSOP\tMain\tEvent\nchampion,\tChris\tMoneymaker,\twho\tqualified\tfor\tthe\tevent\tvia\ta\t$39\tsatellite\tonline.\tHowever,\tthe\naccountant\tfrom\tTennessee\tdid\tnot\tinvent\tthe\tsatellite\tand\tneither\tdid\t\nPokerstars.com\n,\twhich\tis\tthe\tonline\nsite\twhere\the\twon\this\tWSOP\tMain\tEvent\tseat.\nThe\tsatellite\tconcept\twas\tcreated\tin\tthe\tlate\t1970’s\tby\tformer\tcard\troom\tmanager,\tEric\tDrache.\tHaving\nworked\tat\tthe\tGolden\tNugget\tand\tMirage,\tDrache\twas\talso\tthe\tWSOP\ttournament\tdirector\tfrom\t1973\nthrough\t1988.\tIn\tthose\tdays\tthe\tWSOP\twas\tstill\tin\tits\tinfancy.\tDuring\tits\tfirst\tten\tyears,\tthe\taverage\tfield\nfor\tthe\tWSOP\tMain\tEvent\twas\tonly\t22\tplayers,\twith\tits\tlargest\tfield\tof\t54\tin\t1979.\tThus,\tadding\tjust\tone\nmore\tplayer\twould\tbe\ta\tsignificant\tpercentage\tincrease\tto\tthe\tfield.\tDuring\tDrache’s\ttenure\tthe\tgoal\tof\nBinion’s\tHorseshoe\twas\tto\talways\thave\tat\tleast\tone\tmore\tplayer\tin\tthe\tWSOP\tMain\tEvent\tcompared\tto\nthe\tprevious\tyear.\tThis\ttarget\twould\tultimately\tshow\tthe\tpoker\tworld\ta\tgrowing\ttrend\tin\tthe\tevent\tand\npoker\tin\tgeneral.\tConsequently,\tDrache\tdesigned\ta\trevolutionary\tway\tto\tget\tmore\tplayers\tregistered\tfor\nthe\t$10,000\tbuy-in\tevent\t–\tthus\tthe\t$1,000\tsingle\ttable\tsatellite\twas\tborn.\t(For\this\tcontribution\tto\tthe\nworld\tof\tpoker,\twhich\tincluded\tthe\tinvention\tof\tthe\tsatellite,\tDrache\twas\telected\tto\tthe\tPoker\tHall\tof\nFame\tin\t2012.)\nInitially,\tDrache\tthought\tthe\tconcept\twas\tonly\tfor\tplayers\twho\tcouldn’t\tafford\tthe\t$10,000\tbuy-in,\nwhich\twould\tmake\twinning\tthe\tseat\ta\thuge\tdeal.\tHowever,\tafter\ttime,\tsome\tplayers\twould\tplay\tsatellites\nto\tnot\tonly\twin\ta\tseat,\tbut\tto\twin\tmultiple\tseats\tand\tmake\tadditional\tmoney.\tOver\ttime,\tthe\tsatellite\nbecame\tvery\tcommon.\tOther\tcasinos\tsupported\tthe\tWSOP\tby\tproviding\tsatellite\twinners\tto\tthe\tMain\nEvent.\nAlthough\tmore\tplayers\twere\tadded\tto\tthe\tfield\tevery\tyear,\tthe\ttrue\tmoment\tof\tsuccess\tand\tpopularity\nfor\tthe\tsatellite\tcame\tin\t1983.\tThat\tyear,\tTom\tMcEvoy\toutlasted\ta\tfield\tof\t108\tregistrants\tand\twas\ncrowned\tthe\t1983\tWSOP\tMain\tEvent\tchampion.\tThis\tvictory\tchanged\tthe\tpoker\tlandscape\tforever,\tas\nMcEvoy\tbecame\tthe\tfirst\tplayer\tever\tto\twin\tthe\tWSOP\tMain\tEvent\tafter\tearning\this\tseat\tvia\ta\tsatellite.\nIronically\tthe\trunner-up\tthat\tyear,\tRod\tPeate,\talso\twon\this\tseat\tvia\ta\tsatellite,\twith\tboth\tof\tthese\tplayers\noutlasting\tthe\t1976\tand\t1977\tchampion,\tDoyle\tBrunson,\twho\tfinished\tin\t3rd\tplace.\nThe\tWSOP\tpublicized\tthis\tsignificant\tachievement,\tattracting\tmore\tand\tmore\tplayers\tthroughout\tthe\n1980s.\tBy\tthe\tend\tof\tthe\tdecade,\tthe\tregistration\tfor\tthe\tMain\tEvent\talmost\tdoubled,\tand\tby\t2000,\tthe\nenrollment\twas\tover\t500\tplayers.\tHowever,\tin\t2003,\ta\tyoung\tman\tfrom\tTennessee\tcreated\tan\tunrivaled\nexplosion\tin\tpoker\tthat\tchanged\tthe\tWSOP\tMain\tEvent\tforever.\nChris\tMoneymaker\taccidentally\tregistered\tonline\tfor\ta\t$39\tsatellite,\tironically\tbelieving\tit\twas\ta\tcash\ntournament.\tUpon\twinning\tthis\tinitial\tsatellite,\the\tearned\ta\tseat\tinto\tanother\tmulti-table\tsatellite,\tthis\ttime\nfor\ta\tseat\tinto\tthe\tWSOP\tMain\tEvent.\tHe\twon\this\tMain\tEvent\tseat\ta\tfew\tdays\tlater\tand\tthe\trest\tis\thistory.\nWith\tMoneymaker’s\timprobable\tvictory\tcoinciding\twith\tthe\tstart\tof\tthe\thole\tcard\tcameras\tand\texpanded\nESPN\tcoverage,\tNorman\tChad\teventually\tuttered\tthat\ticonic\tphrase,\t“This\tis\tbeyond\tfairytale.\tThis\tis\ninconceivable.”\nAfter\tthat\tfateful\tyear,\tthe\tnumber\tof\tregistrants\tfor\tthe\tWSOP\tMain\tEvent\tbegan\tto\tincrease\nexponentially,\ttripling\tthe\tfollowing\tyear\tand\tincreasing\tten-fold\tin\tjust\tthree\tyears.\tToday,\tthousands\tof\nplayers\tqualify\tvia\tsatellites.\tThe\tfield\tsize\tof\tthe\tMain\tEvent\twould\tnever\tbe\tas\tlarge\twithout\tthem.\nAdditionally,\tdozens\tof\ttournaments\tacross\tthe\tglobe\temploy\ta\tsatellite\tsystem\tto\tincrease\ttheir\tfield\nsizes.\nNumber\tone\tgoal:\tsurvival!',  Document(page_content='In\ta\tpoker\ttournament,\tthe\tobjective\tis\tto\tbe\tthe\tlast\tplayer\tstanding.\tUltimately,\tthe\tplayer\twith\tall\tthe\nchips\tat\tthe\tend\tof\tthe\ttournament\tcaptures\tthe\ttitle\tand\tearns\tthe\tmost\tmoney.\tThe\tplayers\twho\tcome\tin\nsecond\tor\tthird\tor\twho\tsneak\tinto\tthe\tmoney\tearn\tless\tthan\tthe\teventual\twinner,\tdepending\ton\ttheir\tplace.\nHowever,\tsatellites\tare\ta\tdifferent\tanimal\tas\tall\tplayers\twho\tqualify\treceive\tthe\tidentical\tprize:\ta\tseat\nin\tthe\tnext\tevent.\tWhether\tthe\tplayer\tis\tthe\tchip\tleader\tor\tthe\tone\twith\tthe\tleast\tamount\tof\tchips,\teven\tif\the\nor\tshe\thas\tonly\tone\tchip\tleft,\tthey\tall\tearn\ta\tseat\tin\tthe\tqualifying\ttournament.\nThus,\tthe\tnumber\tone\tgoal\tin\ta\tsatellite\tis\tSURVIVAL!\nMany\tplayers\tdo\tnot\trealize\tthis\tpriority\tfor\tsatellites.\tInstead,\tthey\temploy\ta\ttypical\tMTT\tstrategy.\nEven\twith\tan\tabove\taverage\tstack\twith\ta\tfew\teliminations\tleft\tbefore\teveryone\tgets\tin\tthe\tmoney,\tthey\ncontinue\tto\ttake\tunnecessary\trisks\tto\twin.\tRisking\ttheir\tstack,\tespecially\tlate\tin\ta\tsatellite,\tis\tfoolish\tand\nsometimes\tleads\tto\ttheir\tdemise.\tBefore\tI\tdiscuss\tthe\tspecific\tstrategies\tfor\ta\tsatellite,\tlet\tus\tdiscuss\nsome\timportant\tterms\tthat\tI\twill\tuse\tthroughout\tthis\tchapter.\nImportant\tterms\nFold\tequity\nUsing\tWikipedia,\tthe\tdefinition\tof\tthis\tpoker\tterm\tis\tsummarized\tas\tfollows:\nFold\tequity\tis\ta\tconcept\tin\tpoker\tstrategy\tthat\tis\tespecially\timportant\twhen\ta\tplayer\tbecomes\tshort-stacked\tin\ta\tno-limit\t(or\npossibly\tpot-limit)\ttournament…\tFold\tequity\tbecomes\tan\timportant\tconcept\tfor\tshort\tstacks\tfor\tthe\tfollowing\treason.\tOpponents\ncan\tbe\tconsidered\tlikely\tto\tcall\tall-ins\twith\ta\tcertain\trange\tof\thands.\tWhen\tthey\twill\thave\tto\tuse\ta\tlarge\tpercentage\tof\ttheir\nstack\tto\tmake\tthe\tcall,\tthis\trange\tcan\tbe\texpec  Document(page_content='average\tstack\tnear\tthe\tend\tof\tthe\tevent\tis\tusually\tonly\tabout\t10BB.\nTherefore,\tdue\tto\tthe\tlower\taverage\tstack\tin\tsatellites,\tyou\tcan\tpatiently\twait\tuntil\tyou\tare\tdown\tto\t7\tor\n8BB\tbefore\tshoving\twith\tany\ttwo\tcards\tsince\tyou\twill\toften\tstill\thave\tfold\tequity\t(the\texception\twould\nbe\tif\ta\tcouple\tof\thuge\tstacks\tare\tsitting\tbehind\tyou).\tI\thave\teven\twitnessed\ta\tplayer\tinducing\tfolds\tfrom\nopponents\twith\tas\tlittle\tas\t3BB.\tHowever,\tI\twould\tnot\trecommend\tblinding\tyourself\tdown\tto\tthis\tstack\nsize\tas\tmany\tplayers\twill\tcall\ta\traise\tthat\tsmall\twithout\teven\tlooking\tat\ttheir\tcards.\nEffective\tstack\tsize\nAfter\tthe\tinitial\thand\tof\ta\ttournament\tor\tsatellite,\tall\tplayers\twill\thave\tdiffering\tstack\tsizes.\tAs\tthe\ntournament\tprogresses,\tthe\tchip\tleaders\thave\ta\tdistinct\tadvantage.\tThe\tmore\tchips\tyou\tpossess,\tthe\tless\tof\na\tchance\tthat\tyou\tcan\tbe\teliminated\tfrom\ta\ttournament\tor\tsatellite.\tIn\tfact,\thaving\tthe\tbiggest\tstack\tat\tthe\ntable\tmeans\tthat\tyou\tcannot\tbe\teliminated\tfrom\tthe\ttournament\tor\tsatellite\tin\tone\thand.\tHowever,\twhen\nfacing\tan\topponent,\tthe\teffective\tstack\tsize\tyou\tare\tplaying\tfor\tis\tthat\tof\tthe\tplayer\twith\tthe\tsmaller\tstack.\nIn\tessence,\twhen\ttwo\tplayers\tface\toff,\tthe\tamount\tof\tthe\tsmaller\tstack\tis\tthe\tmost\tthat\tcan\tbe\tlost\tby\tthe\nlarger\tstack.\nThis\tconcept\tis\timportant\tas\ta\tchip\tleader\tmay\thave\tsignificant\tchips\tand\tnever\tbe\tat\trisk\tof\tbeing\neliminated.\tHowever,\ta\tsmaller\tstack\twith\tfold\tequity\tmay\tstill\tbe\table\tto\tpush\tall-in\ton\ta\tlarge\tstack,\tif\nthat\tlarge\tstack\tdoes\tnot\twant\tto\tlose\tunnecessary\tchips.\tOverall,\tthe\tlarger\tstack\tneeds\tto\tbe\tfully\taware\nof\tthe\tshort\tstacks\taround\tthe\ttable\tand\tact\taccordingly.\nOdds\tof\thand\tversus\thand\nSince\ta\tsatellite\thas\tsuch\ta\tlow\taverage\tstack\tof\t10BB,\tthere\twill\tbe\tmany\tall-in\tbets\tduring\tthe\tlater\nlevels.\tTo\tcall\tan\tall-in\tbet,\tone\tmust\tbe\tfamiliar\twith\tthe\todds\tof\tyour\thand\tversus\tanother\thand.\nHere\tare\tcommon\tsituations\twith\ttheir\tapproximate\tpercentages\tthat\tyou\tmust\tconsider\tbefore\tcalling\nan\tall-in\tbet.\tYou\tmay\tbe\tsurprised\tby\tsome\tof\tthe\tratios\tand\tmay\treconsider\tbefore\tcalling\tan\tall-in\tbet\nfor\ta\tsignificant\tamount\tof\tyour\tstack.\nCommon\thands\t(example)\nApproximate\todds\tratio\nPair\tover\tpair\t(A-A\tvs.\tQ-Q)\n80:20\nSame\tcard;\tdifferent\tkicker\n\t\n(A-K\tvs.\tA-9\tor\tK-J\tvs.\tQ-J)\n70:30\nPair\tvs.\tone\tovercard\n\t\n(10-10\tvs.\tA-10)\n70:30\nTwo\tovercards\tvs.\ttwo\tundercards\n\t\n(K-J\tvs.\t9-8)\n65:35\nOne\tover\tand\tmiddle\tcard\tvs.\n\t\nin\tbetween\tand\tlower\tcard\t(A-Q\tvs.\tK-J)\n60:40\nOne\tover\tand\tlower\tcard\tvs.\n\t\nmiddle\tcards\t(A-5\tvs.\tK-Q)\n55:45\nTwo\tovercards\tvs.\tunderpair\n\t\n(A-K\tvs.\tJ-J)\n50:50\n(Commonly\treferred\tto\tas\ta\trace\tor\tcoin-flip\tdue\tto\tits\t50:50\tnature)', fective\tstack\tsize\twill\tpossibly\tresult\tin\tthem\tshoving\tall-in\twith\tany\ttwo\tcards\tout\tof\tdesperation.\nOverall,\tas\ta\tbig\tstack,\tyou\twant\tto\tslowly\tbuild\tyour\tstack\twith\tlittle\trisk.\tDo\tnot\tfeel\tthe\tneed\tto\neliminate\tplayers\twith\tmarginal\tholdings.\tLet\tthe\tother\tplayers\tdo\tthe\tdirty\twork\tfor\tyou\twhile\tyou\nconserve\tyour\tchips\tfor\tbetter\tspots.\nMedium\tstack:\t13BB\tto\t24BB\nIf\tyou\thold\tthis\ttype\tof\tchip\tstack,\tyou\tshould\tturn\tto\tconservative\tmode\tand\tdon’t\ttake\tany\tmajor\trisks.\nOver\tthe\tyears,\tI\thave\tseen\tso\tmany\tplayers\tduring\tthese\tlevels\tplay\tway\ttoo\tmany\thands.\tI\twould\tsuggest\nonly\tplaying\thands\tthat\tyou\twould\tbe\twilling\tto\tgo\tall-in\twith.\tIf\tyou\twould\tnot\tbe\twilling\tto\trisk\tyour\nentire\tstack,\tthen\tdo\tnot\teven\tput\tin\tan\tinitial\traise\twith\thands\tlike\tA-9\tor\tK-J.\nJust\tfold!\nThis\tstyle\tmay\tseem\talmost\ttoo\ttight,\tbut\tremember\tthat\tyou\tare\tplaying\tto\tsurvive.\tIf\tyou\traise\tto\n2.5BB\tand\thave\tto\tfold\tto\ta\tre-raise,\tyou\thave\tlost\tthe\tequivalent\tof\tan\tentire\torbit\tof\tblinds\tand\tantes.\nWith\tthe\tblind\tlevels\tin\ta\tsatellite\toften\tonly\t20\tto\t30\tminutes,\tone\torbit\tcould\ttake\tan\tentire\tlevel.\tThus,\nif\tyou\tlose\tone\tof\tyour\traises,\tthose\tchips\tcould\tbe\tthe\tequivalent\tof\tsurviving\tone\tmore\tlevel.\tIn\tthe\tend,\nthis\tcould\tbe\tthe\tdifference\tbetween\twinning\ta\tseat\tor\tnot.\nOne\tmajor\texception\tis\twhen\tthe\taction\tis\tfolded\tto\tyou\twhile\tsitting\tin\tlate\tposition\tand\tthe\tplayers\tto\nyour\tleft\tare\tmedium\tstacks\t(especially\tif\tthese\tplayers\tare\tplaying\tvery\tconservative)\tor\tultra-tight\tbig\nstacks.\tThis\tsituation\tis\ttoo\topportune\tand\tyou\tmust\ttake\tadvantage\tby\traising\tthe\tblinds,\tespecially\tif\tyou\nare\table\tto\tdetect\ta\tfolding\ttell\tfrom\tone\tof\tyour\topponents.\nAlthough\tI\tstated\tbefore\tthat\tlosing\ta\  Document(page_content='Short\tstack:\tless\tthan\t12BB\nFor\tmany\tplayers,\tthis\tstack\tsize\tis\tthe\tone\tthey\tdread\tthe\tmost.\tFor\tme,\ta\tshort\tstack\tis\tthe\teasiest\tto\tplay\nbecause\tthere\tare\tvery\tfew\tdecisions.\tI\tbelieve\tthat\tyou\thave\tonly\ttwo\tmoves:\tfold\tor\tmove\tall-in.\tThe\noptimal\tsituation\twould\tbe\tto\tre-raise\tall-in\tover\tsomeone’s\toriginal\traise,\talso\treferred\tto\tas\t3-betting.\nThis\tspecific\tmove\tallows\tyou\tto\tpick\tup\tnot\tonly\tthe\tblinds\tand\tantes,\tbut\talso\tthe\tinitial\traise,\twhich,\tas\nwe\tmentioned\tbefore,\tis\tthe\tequivalent\tof\tone\torbit\tof\tbets\tand\tsometimes\tan\tentire\tlevel.\tThus,\ta\nsuccessful\t3-bet\toften\twins\tyou\ttwo\tsets\tof\tblinds\tand\tantes\tor\ttwo\torbits\taround\tthe\ttable.\nHowever,\tyou\thave\tto\tbe\taware\tof\tyour\tfold\tequity.\tOnce\tyou\tlose\tyour\tfold\tequity,\tyou\tcan\tno\tlonger\nsimply\tmove\tall-in\twith\tany\ttwo\tcards.\nThe\tfollowing\tformula\tdetermines\twhether\tyou\thave\tenough\tfold\tequity\tto\twait\tone\tor\ttwo\tmore\tcycles\nfor\tsolid\tcards\tor\twhether\tyou\tbarely\thave\tenough\tfold\tequity\tto\tpush\tall-in\twith\tany\ttwo\tcards.\tUse\tthe\nfollowing\tshort\tstack\tstrategy\tformula\tto\tutilize\tfold\tequity\tin\torder\tto\tsurvive.\nShort\tstack\tstrategy\tformula\nFirst,\tcalculate\tthe\tstarting\tpot\tsize\t(SPS),\twhich\tis\tequal\tto\tthe\tblinds\tplus\tantes.\tThis\tcalculation\tis\ncritical\tfor\tthis\tshort\tstack\tstrategy.\tBegin\tcalculating\twhen\tyou\thave\tapproximately\t12BB\tremaining.\nThen\tutilize\tthe\tfollowing\tsteps\tto\tdetermine\tyour\taction:\n1)\tCount\tyour\tchip\tstack\twhen\tyou\tare\ton\tthe\tbutton.\n2)\tDetermine\tSPS.\n3)\tSubtract\tSPS\tfrom\tyour\tcurrent\tchip\tstack.\n4)\tDoes\tyour\tamount\tof\tremaining\tchips\thave\tenough\tfold\tequity\t(can\tyou\tmake\tthe\tstacks\tbehind\tyou\tfold,\twhich\toften\trequires\ta\tbet\nof\tat\tleast\t5BB\tto\t6BB)?\n5)\tIf\tYES,\tcontinue\tto\twait\tfor\tsolid\tcards\t(e.g.\ta\thand\tthat\tyou\tare\tprepared\tto\tgo\tall-in,\twith\ta\tslightly\tbroader\trange\tas\tyou\tare\tshort\nstacked)\tand\trepeat\tstep\t#3.\tIf\tNO,\tgo\tto\tstep\t#6.\n6)\tPush\tall-in\tthe\tfirst\topportunity\tyou\thave\tto\topen\tthe\tpot\tin\torder\tto\tutilize\tyour\tfold\tequity\tbefore\tit\tdisappears.\tRemember,\tit\tis\tvery\nhard\tto\tcall\tan\tall-in\tbet\twith\ta\tweak\thand\tand\tyour\topponents\twant\tto\tsurvive\tas\twell\t(note:\tdo\tnot\tdo\tthis\tif\tsomeone\thas\traised\tin\tfront\nof\tyou).\nNote:\twhen\tpushing\tall-in\tduring\tthis\tsituation\twith\tany\ttwo\tcards,\tmake\tsure\tthat\tyou\tlook\tat\tyour\ncards\tcarefully.\tYou\twant\tto\tact\tas\tif\tyou\tare\tlooking\tdown\tat\ttwo\taces\tso\tyou\tdo\tnot\tgive\taway\tany\ttells\nof\tweakness.\nShort\tstack\tstrategy\tquestion\nYou\tare\ton\tthe\tbutton\tand\thave\t8,300\tchips\tremaining,\n10\tplayers\tat\tthe\ttable,\tblinds\tof\t400/800\tantes\t100\nNo\tone\tat\tthe\ttable\thas\tmore\tthan\t15,500\tchips.\nWill\tyou\tstill\thave\tfold\tequity\tafter\tblinding\tdown\tone\tmore\torbit?\nShort\tstack\tstrategy\tanswer\nSPS\t=\t2,200\nSubtract\t8,300\t–\t2,200\t=\t6,100\nFold\tequity:\tYES\nThe\tformula\tstates\tthat\tyou\twill\thave\tabout\t8BB\tonce\tthe\tblinds\tgo\tthrough\tyou\tone\tmore\ttime.\nNevertheless,\tI\tbelieve\tthat\tyou\thave\tenough\tfold\tequity\tas\tyour\tstack\tsize\tcan\tstill\tdo\tsignificant\tdamage\nto\tother\tplayers’\tstacks,\tincluding\tthe\tchip\tleader.\tThus,\tyou\tdo\tnot\thave\tto\tmake\ta\trash\tdecision\tthis\norbit.\tWait\tfor\tsolid\tcards\twhile\topening\tup\tyour\trange\tslightly.\nNow\tthat\tyou\thave\tdetermined\tyou\thave\tenough\tfold\tequity\tafter\tone\torbit,\tlet’s\tdetermine\tif\tyou\tcan\nwait\tanother\torbit.',  Document(page_content='Subtract\t6,100\t–\t2,200\t=\t3,900\nFold\tequity:\tNO\nHowever,\tif\tyou\tsubtract\tone\tmore\tSPS,\tyour\tstack\twould\tbe\tat\t3,900\tchips.\tThis\tstack\tsize\twould\nprobably\tnot\thave\tenough\tfold\tequity.\tThus,\tif\tyou\tdo\tnot\tpick\tup\ta\tsolid\thand\tafter\tthe\tblinds\tand\tantes\ngo\tthrough\tyou\tonce\tand\tyour\tstack\tis\tat\t6,100,\tyou\tmust\tpush\tall-in\twith\tany\ttwo\tcards\tat\tthe\tfirst\nopportunity.\nThis\tability\tto\tpush\tall-in\twith\tany\ttwo\tcards\twhile\tpossessing\tfold\tequity\tis\tsometimes\tvery\tdifficult\nfor\tplayers\tto\texecute.\tSome\tplayers\tjust\tcan’t\tpull\tthe\ttrigger\twithout\ta\tdecent\thand.\tOthers\tonly\tthink\tof\nthe\tnegative\tresult.\nNevertheless,\tthis\tstrategy\tis\tcritical\tfor\tyour\tsatellite\tsuccess!\tIf\tyou\tdo\tnot\tovercome\tyour\tfear\tof\nelimination\tand\tutilize\tyour\tfold\tequity\tbefore\tit\tdisappears\tcompletely,\tyou\twill\tnot\tbe\tsuccessful\tin\nsatellites.\nWatch\tout\nAlthough\tthe\tformula\tis\tfairly\tstraightforward,\tthere\tare\tsome\tspecific\tsituations\tto\twatch\tout\tfor.\n\tThe\tsmall\tblind\tand/or\tbig\tblind\tis\tshort\tstacked:\tTheir\teffective\tstack\tsize\tmay\tlead\tto\tthem\tcalling\nwith\tany\ttwo\tcards\tas\tthey\tare\tin\tdesperation\tmode\tlike\tyourself.\n\tThe\tsmall\tblind\tor\tbig\tblind\tis\tthe\tchip\tleader:\tThey\tmay\tcall\twith\tany\ttwo\tcards\tas\tthey\tmay\tthink\nthey\thave\tchips\tto\tburn\tand\twant\tto\teliminate\tyou.\n\tThe\tplayer\tto\tyour\tleft\tis\tan\taggressive\tchip\tleader:\tThey\tmay\tcall\twith\tany\ttwo\tcards\tas\tthey\thave\nenough\tchips\tto\trisk\tand\tmay\twant\tto\teliminate\tyou.\tYou\tmay\thave\tto\texecute\tthis\tshort\tstack\nstrategy\tone\torbit\tearlier\tdue\tto\tthis\topponent.\n\tThe\tblind\tlevel\tis\tabout\tto\tincrease\tbefore\tthe\torbit\tis\tcomplete:\tThe\tblinds\tincreasing\twill\taffect\nSPS\tformula\tcalculation\tand\tpossibly\tyour\tfold\tequity.\tIf\tthis\ttiming\twill\toccur\tbefore\tthe\tblinds\tget\nto\tyou,\tI\twould\tcalculate\tthe\tSPS\twith\tthe\thigher\tblind\tlevel\tto\tdetermine\tif\tyou\thave\tenough\tfold\nequity.\n\tThe\tbubble\tis\tabout\tto\tburst:\tAlthough\tyou\thave\tlittle\tfold\tequity,\tthere\tmay\tbe\ta\tplayer\tor\ttwo\twith\nfewer\tchips\tthan\tyou;\tthus,\tyou\tmay\tnot\twant\tto\trisk\tgetting\teliminated\tand\thope\tthat\tone\tof\tthe\nshorter\tstacks\tis\teliminated\tbefore\tyou.\nStrategy\tin\tthe\tlate\tlevels\nI\tdefine\tthis\tstage\tof\tthe\tsatellite\tas\twhen\tthe\tnumber\tof\tplayers\tremaining\tis\tabout\ttwice\tas\tmany\tas\tthe\nnumber\tof\tseats\tbeing\tgiven\tout.\nThese\tlevels\tare\tfairly\tstraightforward\tand\tit\tbecomes\teffectively\ta\tgame\tof\tchicken.\tRegularly,\tmany\nshort\tand\tmiddle\tstacks\tjust\tshove\tall-in\tand\tthere\tis\trarely\tmuch\tpostflop\tplay.\tUltimately,\tthe\tremaining\nplayers\thave\tto\tbe\tdealt\ta\tsignificant\thand\tto\tcall.\tNevertheless,\tmost\tplayers\tfold,\twhich\tis\toften\tthe\ncorrect\tchoice.\nDuring\tthese\tlevels,\tyou\tcan\tmake\ta\tlot\tof\thuge\tlaydowns\tand\tfolding\tA-K\tor\t10-10\tis\tnot\tthat\nuncommon.\tFolding\teven\tbigger\thands\tis\tpossible\t(see\t“Interesting\tsituations”\tlater\tin\tthis\tchapter).\tMost\nplayers\tsit\tand\twait,\thoping\tthat\tthe\tshorter\tstacks\tbecome\tso\tdepleted\tthat\tthey\tlose\ttheir\tfold\tequity.\nEventually,\tbigger\tstacks\tthat\tcan\tafford\tto\ttake\tthe\trisk\twill\tcall\tthem\tdown.\tHowever,\tdue\tto\tthe\tnature',  Document(page_content='when\tplaying\tagainst\tdecent\tcompetition.\tPoker\ttells\twon’t\tusually\tbe\ta\tbig\tgame\tchanger,\tbut\tthey\tcan\nhelp\tinform\tborderline\tdecisions.\nThe\tfrequency\tof\ta\tpoker\ttell\nThe\t\nfrequency\n\tof\ta\tpoker\ttell\tis\tan\tentirely\tdifferent\tconcept\tthan\tis\tits\t\nreliability\n.\tA\tpoker\ttell\tcan\tbe\nvery\treliable\tbut\tvery\tinfrequent;\ta\ttell\tcan\talso\tbe\tvery\tfrequent\tbut\tnot\tvery\treliable.\nFor\texample,\tlet’s\tsay\ta\tplayer\tsays\t“Damn!”\t10%\tof\tthe\ttime\twhen\tbetting\tthe\triver\twith\ta\tstrong\nhand.\tHe\tnever\tsays\t“Damn”\twhen\tbluffing.\nHis\ttell\tis\tinfrequent,\tyet\tit\tis\t100%\treliable.\nHe\tonly\tsays\t“Damn”\t10%\tof\tthe\ttime\twith\ta\tstrong\thand.\tBut\tthose\ttimes\the\tdoes\tsay\tit,\twe\tcan\tbe\n100%\tsure\the\thas\ta\tstrong\thand.\nThis\tleads\tto\tan\timportant\tobservation\tabout\tpoker\ttells:\nThe\tabsence\tof\ta\tpoker\ttell\tis\tnot\titself\ta\tpoker\ttell.\nIn\tthe\tprevious\texample,\tit\twould\tbe\ta\tmistake\tto\tthink\tsomething\tlike,\t“I\theard\thim\tsay\t‘Damn’\twhen\nbetting\ta\tstrong\thand\ta\tcouple\ttimes,\tso\twhen\the\tdoesn’t\tsay\t‘Damn’\the\tmust\tbe\tbluffing.”\tThis\tplayer’s\ntell\tonly\toccurs\t10%\tof\tthe\ttime\twhen\tbetting\ta\tstrong\thand,\tso\tit\twould\tbe\ta\tmistake\tto\tassume\tthat\tthe\nabsence\tof\tthis\tbehavior\tis\tmeaningful.\t(Mathematically,\tit\tis\tactually\tvery\tslightly\tmeaningful\tbut\tfor\tall\nintents\tand\tpurposes\tit\tis\tso\tslight\tas\tto\tbe\tunimportant.)\tThis\tmeans\tthat\tyou’d\treally\tonly\tbe\tfactoring\nthis\tplayer’s\tbehavior\tinto\tyour\tdecision-making\tprocess\twhen\the\tsays\t“Damn,”\tand\tnot\tthe\ttimes\the\tis\nsilent.\nThe\tlack\tof\ta\tpoker\ttell\tonly\tbecomes\ta\tpoker\ttell\titself\tif\tthe\tbehavior\tis\tboth\thighly\treliable\tand\tvery\nfrequent.\tFor\tan\textreme\texample:\tif\tthis\tplayer\tsaid\t“Damn”\twhen\tbluffing\tthe\triver\t100%\tof\tthe\ttime,\nthen\tthose\ttimes\twhe \tfor:',  Document(page_content='you\tdiscover\tit\tnaturally,\tit’s\tunlikely\tyou’ll\tever\tforget\tit.\nYou\tmight\tpull\tup\tthat\tcalculator\tand\tgo,\t“Well,\tI\thave\t$50.\tI’m\tgoing\tto\twin\tanother\t$50\tif\tI\twin.\tI\ncan’t\tmultiply,\tsubtract,\tor\tadd\tto\tget\ta\tfraction.\tSo\tI\tmust\tdivide!\tBut\twait\t…\t$50\tdivided\tby\t$50\tequals\none.\tI\tdon’t\tneed\tto\twin\t100%\tof\tthe\ttime!\tThat\tcan’t\tbe\tright.”\nHere’s\thow\tyou\tdo\tit.\tTake\tthe\t$50\tyou\tthrow\tdown\tonto\tthe\ttable\tbefore\twe\tflip\tthe\tcoin.\tNow\tlook\nhow\tmuch\tis\tin\ton\tthe\ttable,\tthe\twhole\t“pot”.\tWe\tneed\tthese\ttwo\tdifferent\tnumbers.\nThe\tamount\tyou\tbet\twas\t50.\tThe\tpot\tsize\tis\t100.\tYou\tdivide\t50,\tyour\tbet,\tby\tthe\tsize\tof\tthe\tpot,\t100.\n50/100\t=\t0.5.\tThis\tis\tcorrect.\tOn\ta\tneutral\tEV\twager\tyou\tneed\tto\twin\t50%\tof\tthe\ttime\tin\torder\tto\tbreak\neven.\nNow,\tlet’s\treturn\tto\tour\texample\twhere\twe’re\traising\tfrom\tthe\tsmall\tblind.\tHow\tmuch\tis\tyour\tbet\there?\nRemember,\twe\traised\tit\tto\t3,000.\nIf\tyou\tsaid\twhat\tseems\tlike\tthe\tobvious\tanswer,\t3,000,\tyou’ve\tmade\ta\tvery\tcommon\tmistake.\tYour\t500\nsmall\tblind\tis\tnot\tpart\tof\tyour\tbet.\tIt\tbelongs\tto\tthe\tpot,\tnot\tyou.\tWe\tare\tnot\ttracking\thow\tmuch\tmoney\tis\ninvested.\tWe\tare\tasking\thow\toften\tyour\traise\tneeds\tto\twork.\nYour\tactual\traise\tis\t2,500.\tYou\tare\trisking\t2,500\tto\twin\t3,000\t(the\ttotal\tsize\tof\tyour\traise)\t+\tthe\t1,000\tbig\tblind,\tand\t1,000\tin\nantes.\tTo\tsimplify\t2,500/5,000\t=\t50%.\nMany\tof\tyou\tmight\tfind\tit\tstrange\twe’re\tcounting\tour\t2,500\traise\tin\tthe\t5,000\ttournament\tmoney\twe\n“win”.\tHowever,\tjust\tlike\tyour\tsmall\tblind,\tonce\tthat\tmoney\tenters\tthe\tpot\tit\tis\tnot\tyours\tanymore.\nAnother\tway\tto\tthink\tabout\tit\tis\tthat\tyou\tare\tdividing\thow\tmuch\tyou\tcould\tpotentially\tlose\tby\tall\tthe\nchips\tthat\tare\tgoing\tto\tgo\tback\tinto\tyour\tstack\tif he\tbutton,\talso\twith\t40BB.\nWe\thave\tthem\tboth\tcovered.\tWe\tdecide\tto\tmake\tit\t13,000\tfrom\tthe\tbig\tblind.\tWe\tare\trisking\t12,000\tto\nwin\t21,000,\twhich\tmeans\tour\tbet\tneeds\tto\twork\t57.14%\tof\tthe\ttime.\nWhile\tthe\tnumbers\tmight\tnot\tbe\texact\t(you’re\tunlikely\tto\tbe\tat\ttoo\tmany\t10-handed\ttables),\ta\tsimilar\nsituation\twill\tplay\titself\tout\tin\tmany\tof\tyour\tpotential\t4-bet\tbluffing\tspots.\tHow\tdo\twe\tfigure\tout\tif\twe\nshould\t4-bet\there?\tWell,\twe\ttake\tpossible\topening\tand\t3-betting\tranges,\tand\tsee\twhere\twe\tcan\tdraw\tthe\nline.\tThen\twe\twrite\tdown\twhat\tthat\tline\tis,\tand\ttake\tit\twith\tus\ton\tour\tdaily\tbusiness.\nLet’s\ttry\tone.\tThe\toriginal\traiser\tis\topening\twith\t40%\tof\thands.\tThis\tis\twhy\tthe\tbutton\twas\t3-betting\tso\nmuch.\tWe\tsee\tthat\tthe\tbutton’s\toverall\t3-bet\tis\tnormally\t14%,\tbut\tit’s\t18%\twhen\ton\tthe\tbutton.\tIt’s\tvery\nimportant\tto\tlook\tat\twhere\tsomeone\tlikes\tto\t3-bet,\tas\tthere\tare\tmany\tfavorite\tspots.\tFor\texample,\nsomebody\twho\t3-bets\ta\tgood\tdeal\tmight\tnever\tdo\tit\tfrom\tthe\tbutton\tbecause\tthey’re\tworried\tit\tlooks\ttoo\nobvious.\nFor\tan\testimate\twe\tsay\tthey’re\t3-betting\t15%\tof\tthe\ttime\tin\tthis\tsituation.\nHow\tdo\twe\tfigure\tout\tif\tour\t4-bet\tis\tgoing\tto\twork?',  Document(page_content='Recall,\the\tneeded\tto\tbe\tdefending\t66%\tof\this\thands\tto\tprevent\tus\tfrom\tprofitably\tcontinuation\tbetting\nwith\tany\ttwo\tcards.\nKnowing\thow\tto\tdo\tthis\tis\textremely\timportant,\tbecause\tyou\twill\thear\tmany\tpeople\tsay,\tunequivocally,\n“You\tcannot\tbet\tthis\tboard.”\tYou\tcan\tnow\tproduce\tFlop-zilla\tand\tsay,\t“Prove\tit.”\tIf\tthey\tcan’t,\tit’s\nbecause\tthey\thave\tnever\tdone\tthis\twork\tthemselves\tand\tthey’re\tmaking\tthe\tmistake\tof\ttreating\ttheir\tgut\ninstincts\tas\tfacts.\nLet’s\ttake\tanother\tboard,\tsame\tsituation.\t10\n-8\n-6\n.\tAgain,\tcomplete\tbrick,\tno\tbackdoor\tdraw,\nalthough\tnow\twe\tdo\thave\ttwo\tovercards.\tDo\tyou\tthink\twe\tshould\tcontinuation\tbet\tthis\tboard?\tThis\tis\nvery\tsimilar\tto\tmany\tboards\twhere\tpeople\tgo,\t“Oh\tthis\tsmacks\this\tflatting\trange”\t(Diagram\t10).\nDiagram\t10\nYou’ll\tnotice\tin\tthis\texample\tthe\thands\twe\thave\tfiltered\tare\tbarely\tdefending\tenough\tto\tprevent\tus\tfrom\ncontinuation\tbetting\tprofitably.\tHowever,\tlook\twhat\tI\thave\tincluded.\tWe\thave\tour\topponent\tplaying\tany\npair\tand\tany\tdraw.\t5-5,\t4-4,\t3-3,\tand\t2-2\tall\tare\tcalling.\tHe\tcould\talso\tbe\tcalling\twith\tgutshot\tstraight\ndraws\tsuch\tas\tQ-J,\tbut\tthat\tactually\thelps\tyour\tequity\tsince\tcurrently\tyou\thave\tthat\thand\tbeat.\tSo,\twe\tcan\ndeduce\tit\twould\ttake\ta\tTerminator\tdefender\tbefore\tour\tbet\tbecomes\tunprofitable.\tAgainst\tany\tnormal\nopponent\twho\twon’t\tplay\t5-5\ton\tthis\tboard\tyou\tshould\tbet.\tConsidering\tif\the\tflats\tyou\ton\tthis\tboard\this\nrange\tis\tlikely\tcapped\tat\tone\tpair\tyou\tshould\treally\tbet,\tas\tyou\thave\tovercard\tdraws\tto\tbeat\thim,\tand\tyou\ncould\talso\tbluff\thim\ton\tscarier\tturn\tand\triver\tcards.\nWhat\tyou\tend\tup\tfinding\tis\tthat\ton\tmost\tboard\tstructures\twith\tsome\tequity\tyou\tcan\tprofitably\ncontinuation\tbet,\tespecially\tif\tyour\topponent\tis\tnot\tspectacular  Document(page_content='09\nSHORT\tSTACK\tSTRATEGIES:\tOLD\tSCHOOL\tVERSUS\tNEW\nSCHOOL\nIntroduction\nWith\tthe\tarrival\tof\tinternet\tpoker\ton\ta\tglobal\tscale\tin\t2004\tcame\tmany\tnew\tinteresting\tmathematical\nsolutions\tfor\tno-limit\tHold’em.\tWith\tthese\tgleaming\tnew\ttheories\tin\ttheir\tarsenal\tmany\tof\tthe\t“new\nschool”\t–\tplayers\twho\tcame\tprimarily\tfrom\tthe\tinternet\t–\tbegan\tto\twin\tthe\tworld’s\tbiggest\tpoker\ntournaments.\tBut\twas\tthis\tentirely\tdue\tto\tthe\tsheer\tnumber\tof\tnew\tschool\tplayers?\tThere\tare\t1,000,000\tor\nmore\tnew\tschool\tplayers\tversus\t500\told\tschool\tplayers.\tAlthough\tthe\told\tschool\tplayers\tadd\tup\tto\tless\nthan\t0.1\tpercent\tof\tthe\ttotal\tplayers\tin\tthe\tgame,\tit\twould\tbe\ta\tbig\tmistake\tto\tthink\tthat\tthe\tgigantic\tnumber\nof\tnew\tschool\tplayers\tis\tthe\tonly\texplanation\tfor\ttheir\tdisproportionate\tsuccess.\tThere\tare\tmany\tgreat\nnew\tschool\tplayers\twho\twill\tstand\tthe\ttest\tof\ttime,\tand\tthere\tare\tmany\tgreat\tnew\tschool\ttheories\tthat\tare\nso\tgood\tthey\thave\talready\taltered\tthe\ttournament\tpoker\tlandscape\tforever.\tIn\tthis\tchapter,\tI\tam\tgoing\tto\nfocus\ton\tone\tsuch\ttheory:\tthe\tshort\tstack\ttheory\tdeveloped\tby\tthe\tnew\tschool.\nI\thave\tasked\tLiv\tBoeree\tto\trepresent\tthe\tnew\tschool.\tLiv\twill\thelp\tme\texamine\tthe\tdifferences\nbetween\tmy\town\tshort\tstack\tapproach\t(which\thas\tserved\tme\twell\tsince\t1988)\tand\tthe\tnew\tschool\ntheories.\tA\tshort\tstack\tis\tconsidered\ta\tstack\tcontaining\t20BB\tor\tless.\tContext\twill\tbe\tneeded,\tso\tLiv\tand\nI\twill\tcompare\tand\tcontrast\tthese\ttheories\tboth\tin\tonline\tand\tlive\ttournaments.\nThe\t20BB\tstack\nTo\tme,\t20BB\tdoes\tnot\tseem\tshort!\tAfter\tall,\tyou\tcan\tfold\ttwo\trounds\tin\ta\trow\t(a\twhole\t18\thands)\tand\nlose\tonly\t3BB\tto\t5BB\t–\tdepending\ton\twhether\tor\tnot\tthere\tis\tan\tante\teach\thand.\tBut\tthe\tnew\tschool\ntheory\thas\trules\tfor\ta\t20BB\tstack,\tbased\ton\tplaying\tcountless\tonline\ttournaments.\tAccording\tto\tLiv,\tthese\nare\tthe\trules:\n\tYour\topening\tranges\tbecome\ttighter\tthan\tbefore.\tYou\tcan\trarely\tcall\t3-bets\twith\tthis\tstack\tsize\tand\ntherefore\tyou\tshould\tavoid\topening\tspeculative\thands\tsuch\tas\tsuited\tconnectors\tunless\tyour\ttable\tis\nparticularly\tpassive.\n\tBet\tsizing,\tboth\tpreflop\tand\tespecially\tpostflop,\tshould\tbe\tsmaller\t(e.g.\t1/3-pot\tinstead\tof\tyour\tusual\n1/2-pot\tbet).\tThis\tis\tto\tgive\tyou\tmore\tmaneuverability;\twhen\tyou\thave\tvalue\thands,\tyou\tcan\tstill\neasily\tget\tyour\tentire\tstack\tin\tby\tthe\triver\tand,\tbecause\tyour\topponent\tknows\tthis\ttoo,\tit\tallows\tyou\nto\tmake\tcheaper,\tbelievable\tbluffs.\n\t3-bet\tshoving\tover\ta\traise\tin\tlate\tposition\tbecomes\tan\toption.\tIt’s\timpossible\tto\tgive\tpredefined',  Document(page_content='shoving\tranges\tas\tit\tis\talways\tdependent\ton\tyour\tsituation.\tFortunately\tthere\tare\ta\tnumber\tof\tequity\ncalculators\tthat\tcan\thelp\tyou\tdeduce\ta\tcorrect\tshoving\trange.\tA\tparticularly\tgood\tsite\tis\nwww.holdemresources.net\n,\twhich\tincludes\tsome\tfree\tand\tpurchasable\tcalculation\tsoftware.\n\tYou\tcan\tof\tcourse\tstill\tcall\tpreflop\traises\twith\thands\tas\tyou\twould\twith\ta\tdeeper\tstack.\tIt\tjust\nbecomes\tmuch\tmore\timportant\tto\tconsider\tthe\tpostflop\tplayability\tof\tyour\thand.\tFor\texample,\tif\tyou\nare\ton\tthe\tbutton\tand\tfacing\ta\traise\tfrom\tthe\tcutoff,\tsmall\tpairs\tshould\tbe\tshoved\tas\tthey\thave\tstrong\npreflop\tvalue\tand\tyour\tstack\tis\ttoo\tshallow\tto\tallow\tfor\tset\tmining.\tHowever,\tyou\tcan\tstill\tcall\twith\na\thand\tlike\tK-J\tor\tQ\n-J\n\tbecause\tit\toften\tdominates\tthe\tcutoff’s\tholding\tand\tplays\twell\tpostflop.\n\tDepending\ton\tICM,\tit\tmay\tbecome\tcorrect\tto\topen\tshove\tsome\thands\tto\tforce\tyour\topponents\tto\tfold\nalmost\teverything,\tsuch\tas\twhen\tyou\tare\tclose\tto\ta\tmoney\tbubble.\tAgain,\tICM\tcalculators\tcan\thelp\nyou\twork\tout\texactly\twhen/if\tyou\tshould\tbe\tshoving.\nI\tlove\tLiv’s\tnew\tschool\trules,\texcept\tone.\tPersonally\tI’m\tnot\tkeen\ton\tshoving\t20BB\twith\ta\tsmall\tpair\nwhen\tfaced\twith\ta\traise\tfrom\tthe\tcutoff.\tTo\tme,\twhether\tor\tnot\tI\twould\tmake\tthis\tall-in\tmove\tis\ncompletely\tread\tdependent.\tIf\tI\tread\tmy\topponent\tto\tbe\tweak,\tthen\tI\twould\tpull\tthe\ttrigger\tand\tmove\tall-\nin\twith\ta\tsmall\tpair.\tIf\tI\tread\tmy\topponent\tto\tbe\tsuper\tstrong,\tthen\tI\tmight\tcall\ta\t2.5BB\traise\tand\tset\tmine,\nor\tI\tmay\topt\tto\tfold\tright\tthere\tand\tthen.\tHowever,\tif\tI’m\tfacing\tan\topponent\ton\tthe\tinternet\tthen\tI\twould,\nmore\toften\tthan\tnot,\tmove\tall-in.\tThe\tonly\ttime\tI\twouldn’t\tmove\tall-in\tis\tif\tI\thave\tnoticed\tthat\tmy\nopponent\thas\tbeen\tplaying\treally\ttight,\tin\twhich\tcase\tI\twould\tsuspect\tthat\the\tis\ta\tlot\tmore\tlikely\tto\thave\ta\nhand\tthat\the\tcould\tcall\tme\twith.\nExample\t1\t(20BB)\nThe\tblinds\tare\t1,000/2,000-300,\tyou\tare\ton\tthe\tbutton\twith\t40,000\t(20BB).\tYou\thave\t4-4,\tand\teveryone\nhas\tfolded\tto\tyou.\tWhat\tdo\tyou\tdo?\nPhil\nI\twould\traise\tit\tup\tto\t6,000\t(3BB)\tand\thope\tthat\tboth\tplayers\tin\tthe\tblinds\tfold.\tIf\teither\tplayer\tin\tthe\nblinds\topted\tto\tmove\tall-in,\tthen\tI\twould\tfold.\nLiv\nNormally\tI\twould\traise\tto\t4,000\t(2BB,\twhich\tis\tmy\tusual\traise\tsize\twith\tall\thands\tduring\tthe\tmiddle\tand\nlate\tstages\tof\ta\ttournament).\tThis\tis\tbecause\ta\tmin-raise\tusually\tachieves\tthe\tsame\tas\ta\t3BB\traise\twhen\nthe\taverage\tstack\tis\tshallower\tand\tit’s\timportant\tto\tmaintain\tmaneuverability.\tFurthermore,\tsince\tI’m\tonly\nraising\tto\t4,000\tI\tlose\tless\tof\tmy\tstack\tif\tI\thave\tto\tfold\tto\tan\topponent’s\tre-raise.\tHowever,\tPhil’s\tbigger\nraise\tsize\thas\tsome\tmerit\tif\tthe\tplayers\tin\tthe\tblinds\tare\tloose-passive.\tWe\twant\tto\tavoid\tplayers\ndefending\ta\twide\trange\tof\tovercards\tversus\tour\tsmall\tpair\tand\tforcing\tus\tto\tmake\tdifficult\tdecisions\npostflop\tfor\tour\tentire\tstack.\nIf\tthe\tblinds\tare\tespecially\taggressive,\tI\toften\traise\twith\tthe\tintention\tof\tcalling\ta\tjam.\tThis\tis\tbecause\nthere\tare\tsome\thands\tin\ttheir\tshoving\trange\tthat\twe\tdominate\tsuch\tas\tA-3,\tA-2,\tand\ta\tsubstantial\tnumber\nof\thands\twe’re\tflipping\tagainst.\tAlternatively,\tyou\tcan\tprofitably\topen\tshove\tthe\tbutton\tif\tyou\tknow\nthey’re\tvery\taggressive\tand\tdon’t\tfancy\tthe\tvariance!\nExample\t2\t(20BB)\nWith\teight\tplayers\tremaining\t(playing\ttwo\t4-handed\ttables)\tin\tthe\t(World\tSeries\tof\tPoker\t(WSOP)\t2012',  Document(page_content='$10,000\tbuy-in\tNo-Limit\tHold’em\t6-Max\tTournament,\tsix-time\tWSOP\tbracelet\twinner\tLayne\tFlack\twas\non\tthe\tbutton.\tAfter\tGreg\tMerson\tfolded\tthe\tcutoff,\tLayne\tlooked\tdown\tat\t10-9\twith\ta\tstack\tof\t230,000\n(19BB)\twith\tthe\tblinds\tat\t6,000/12,000-2,000.\tLayne\traised\tto\t26,000,\tthinking\tthat\the\thad\ta\ttight\ttable\nimage\tand\tthat\t26,000\twould\thave\tthe\tsame\teffect\tas\ta\t40,000\traise.\tLayne\tlikes\ta\tmin-raise\tbecause\tit\ngives\thim\tmore\tmaneuverability.\tThe\tplayer\tin\tthe\tsmall\tblind\tre-raised\tto\t62,000.\tLayne\tthought\tfor\ta\nmoment\tand\tthen\the\tdecided\tthat\ta\t17BB\tstack\tplayed\troughly\tthe\tsame\tas\ta\t14BB\tstack,\tand\tthus\the\nopted\tto\tcall.\tThe\tflop\twas\tJ-10-8,\tthe\tplayer\tin\tthe\tsmall\tblind\tmoved\tall-in\tand\tLayne\tcalled,\tdoubling\nup\tversus\this\topponent’s\tA-9.\nPhil\nAlthough\tI\twould\thave\topened\tfor\t36,000,\tI\tlike\tLayne’s\tlogic\t(he\thad\ta\ttight\timage)\tand\tI\tdon’t\tmind\this\nmin-raise\tto\t26,000.\tHowever,\tI\twould\thave\tfolded\tto\tthe\t36,000\tre-raise.\tI\tdon’t\tthink\tthat\t10-9\tis\tthe\nbest\thand\tvery\toften\tand\tit’s\tnot\teasy\tto\thit\tthat\thand\thard.\tToo\toften\tyou\twill\tflop\tnothing\t(and\tbluffing\tis\nnot\tmuch\tof\tan\toption\twith\ta\tshort\tstack\tagainst\taggressive\tplayers)\tand\tbe\tforced\tto\tfold\ton\tthe\tflop.\tAnd\nthen\twhen\tyou\tdo\thit,\tfor\texample\twhen\tit\tcomes\tQ-9-4,\tyou\tcould\teasily\tbe\tin\tbad\tshape\tfor\tthe\trest\tof\nyour\tstack.\tPersonally,\tI’m\tlooking\tto\tconserve\tmy\tchips\tand\tsave\tthem\tfor\ta\tbetter\tspot.\nAs\tfor\tthe\tplayer\tin\tthe\tsmall\tblind,\tI\twould\thave\tmade\ta\tread,\tand\tif\tI\tsensed\tweakness,\tthen\tI\twould\nhave\tmade\ta\tmuch\tbigger\tre-raise,\tperhaps\tto\t55,000\tmore\tto\tgo\t(81,000\ttotal).\tI\tdo\tnot\twant\tto\tget\ncalled,\tand\tfor\tthat\treason,\tmy\tre-raise\tsizing\tis\tbigger\tthan\tthe\tnew\tschool\tstandards.\tIf\t \tbet\nand,\tif\tso,\thow\tmuch?\nWe\thave\tflopped\tsome\tequity\twith\ta\tnumber\tof\tturns\tthat\tcan\timprove\tour\thand,\tor\tgive\tthe\tperception',
